programme.title: ABC Agathy Christie
programme.desc: Rok 1933. Emerytowany belgijski detektyw Herkules Poirot (John Malkovich) stara się wytropić wyrafinowanego seryjnego zabójcę, który wysyła tajemnicze listy podpisane "ABC". Śledczy musi je rozszyfrować, aby odkryć tożsamość niebezpiecznego przestępcy. Wspiera go inspektor Crome (Rubert Grint). Trzymająca w napięciu adaptacja prozy mistrzyni gatunku - Agathy Christie - z nominowanym w karierze dwukrotnie do Oscara ("Miejsca w sercu", "Na linii ognia") Johnem Malkovichem.

Revolves around a family of New York cops." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1595859/","name":"Blue Bloods","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjY0NTE1ODU3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTI4NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Revolves around a family of New York cops.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1595859/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"thelmalee"},"dateCreated":"2013-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enjoy the family dinners, and the religion (I'm not Catholic)","reviewBody":"My sister and I watch and discuss this series every Friday. We absolutely love the family dinners. So incredibly nice to see a family that all love and respect each other. Although challenges to their faith are often brought up - usually from questioning by the two sons. They make it clear that keeping faith takes work. 

I am not Catholic -- but I still very much appreciate their efforts. (Although I admit their attempts to depict other religions positively - is a hard go for them!)

I'm looking forward to what script changes may be made - with the appointment of Bratton, our new police commissioner.

IMDb data; ttnr: 1595859, Title: Blue Bloods, --- Description: Blue Bloods: Created by Mitchell Burgess, Robin Green. With Donnie Wahlberg, Bridget Moynahan, Will Estes, Len Cariou. Revolves around a family of New York cops." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1595859/","name":"Blue Bloods","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjY0NTE1ODU3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTI4NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Revolves around a family of New York cops.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1595859/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"thelmalee","dateCreated":"2013-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enjoy the family dinners, and the religion (I'm not Catholic)","reviewBody":"My sister and I watch and discuss this series every Friday. We absolutely love the family dinners. So incredibly nice to see a family that all love and respect each other. Although challenges to their faith are often brought up - usually from questioning by the two sons. They make it clear that keeping faith takes work. 

I am not Catholic -- but I still very much appreciate their efforts. (Although I admit their attempts to depict other religions positively - is a hard go for them!)

I'm looking forward to what script changes may be made - with the appointment of Bratton, our new police commissioner. 

(St. Vincent's Hospital is still open in this drama - ah, if only it were so.)","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":34487,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2010-09-24","keywords":"new york police department,family relationships,brother brother relationship,father daughter relationship,family of cops","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005531/","name":"Donnie Wahlberg","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005256/","name":"Bridget Moynahan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0261678/","name":"Will Estes"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0106949/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0315236/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0121331/","name":"Mitchell Burgess","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1053841/","name":"Robin Green"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Blue Bloods: Series","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4119967769","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"First Look Trailer for Blue Bloods"</script><metacontent="

Revolves around a family of New York cops." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1595859/","name":"Blue Bloods","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjY0NTE1ODU3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTI4NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Revolves around a family of New York cops.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1595859/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"thelmalee"},"dateCreated":"2013-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enjoy the family dinners, and the religion (I'm not Catholic)","reviewBody":"My sister and I watch and discuss this series every Friday. We absolutely love the family dinners. So incredibly nice to see a family that all love and respect each other. Although challenges to their faith are often brought up - usually from questioning by the two sons. They make it clear that keeping faith takes work. 

I am not Catholic -- but I still very much appreciate their efforts. (Although I admit their attempts to depict other religions positively - is a hard go for them!)

I'm looking forward to what script changes may be made - with the appointment of Bratton, our new police commissioner. 

(St. Vincent's Hospital is still open in this drama - ah, if only it were so.)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":34487,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2010-09-24","keywords":"new york police department,family relationships,brother brother relationship,father daughter relationship,family of cops","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005531/","name":"Donnie Wahlberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005256/","name":"Bridget Moynahan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0261678/","name":"Will Estes"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0106949/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0315236/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0121331/","name":"Mitchell Burgess"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1053841/","name":"Robin Green"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Blue Bloods: Series","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4119967769","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"First Look Trailer for Blue Bloods"}}</script><metacontent="

We absolutely love the family dinners. So incredibly nice to see a family that all love and respect each other. Although challenges to their faith are often brought up - usually from questioning by the two sons. They make it clear that keeping faith takes work. 

I am not Catholic -- but I still very much appreciate their efforts. (Although I admit their attempts to depict other religions positively - is a hard go for them!)

I'm looking forward to what script changes may be made - with the appointment of Bratton, our new police commissioner.

programme.title: 60 kilo niczego
programme.desc: Krzysztof Kowalik (Grzegorz Damięcki) zaczyna nowy dzień pracy na stanowisku kierownika kopalni kruszców. Żeby zyskać posłuch, zamierza sprawować bezwzględne rządy. Kiedy dochodzi do nieszczęśliwego wypadku, jego moralność zostaje wystawiona na próbę.

programme.title: Acid Rain
programme.desc: Młoda ucieka z domu. Podróżuje autostopem. Poznaje niezrównoważonego dziwaka Chudego. Pod osłoną nocy snują się po mieście, docierają w coraz dziwniejsze rejony, doświadczając niezwykłych emocji.

programme.title: The Painted Veil
Malowany welon
The Painted Veil
programme.desc:
The Painted Veil: Directed by John Curran. With Catherine An, Bin Li, Bin Wu, Alan David. A British medical doctor fights a cholera epidemic in a small Chinese village, while being trapped at home in a loveless marriage to an unfaithful wife." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0446755/","name":"The Painted Veil","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMzODg4MjU4OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNDAzNTU3._V1_.jpg","description":"A British medical doctor fights a cholera epidemic in a small Chinese village, while being trapped at home in a loveless marriage to an unfaithful wife.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0446755/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bellisland"},"dateCreated":"2006-12-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"A most transporting film.","reviewBody":"I think is the tone of the film  and by that I mean everything from the cinematography to the dialogue the music and, most of all, the nuanced performances  which, because it is so consistent and so consistently sublime renders the film far apart from the ordinary. 

I was interested to see that Naomi Watts and Edward Norton produced this film. No matter which of them (or, for that matter, any one of the film's fine cast) is on the screen, we are fully involved: they invite us into their story, they invite us to care. 

Even if one were to strip away the performances and the story there is still the sheer beauty of the Chinese countryside, filmed to perfection.

Just go, and see for yourself.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":90892,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2006-12-29","keywords":"cholera,loveless marriage,unfaithful wife,china,epidemic","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Painted Veil","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4008771865","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTdlY2MwYTMtNmZkOS00MDkwLTg5NzctMDAzNWZjYWY3Mzg0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTdlY2MwYTMtNmZkOS00MDkwLTg5NzctMDAzNWZjYWY3Mzg0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Warner Home Video"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0915208/","name":"Naomi Watts"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001570/","name":"Edward Norton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000630/","name":"Liev Schreiber"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0192845/","name":"John Curran"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0001146/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0089918/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0107198/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0638913/","name":"Ron Nyswaner"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0560857/","name":"W. Somerset Maugham"}],"duration":"PT2H5M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.review: --- Actors: Catherine An (role=Hostess), Bin Li (role=Te-Ming), Bin Wu (role=Student 1), Alan David (role=Mr. Garstin), Marie-Laure Descoureaux (role=Sister St. Joseph), Sally Hawkins (role=Mary), Juliet Howland (role=Dorothy Townsend), Toby Jones (role=Waddington), Lorraine Laurence (role=Sister Maryse), Gwing-Gai Lee (role=Angry Chinese Man), Li Feng (role=Sung Ching), Gesang Meiduo (role=Amah)

IMDb data; ttnr: 0446755, Title: The Painted Veil, --- Description: The Painted Veil: Directed by John Curran. With Catherine An, Bin Li, Bin Wu, Alan David. A British medical doctor fights a cholera epidemic in a small Chinese village, while being trapped at home in a loveless marriage to an unfaithful wife." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0446755/","name":"The Painted Veil","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMzODg4MjU4OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNDAzNTU3._V1_.jpg","description":"A British medical doctor fights a cholera epidemic in a small Chinese village, while being trapped at home in a loveless marriage to an unfaithful wife.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0446755/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"bellisland","dateCreated":"2006-12-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"A most transporting film.","reviewBody":"I think is the tone of the film  and by that I mean everything from the cinematography to the dialogue the music and, most of all, the nuanced performances  which, because it is so consistent and so consistently sublime renders the film far apart from the ordinary. 

I was interested to see that Naomi Watts and Edward Norton produced this film. No matter which of them (or, for that matter, any one of the film's fine cast) is on the screen, we are fully involved: they invite us into their story, they invite us to care. 

Even if one were to strip away the performances and the story there is still the sheer beauty of the Chinese countryside, filmed to perfection.

Just go, and see for yourself.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":90892,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2006-12-29","keywords":"cholera,loveless marriage,unfaithful wife,china,epidemic","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Painted Veil","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4008771865","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTdlY2MwYTMtNmZkOS00MDkwLTg5NzctMDAzNWZjYWY3Mzg0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTdlY2MwYTMtNmZkOS00MDkwLTg5NzctMDAzNWZjYWY3Mzg0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Warner Home Video","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0915208/","name":"Naomi Watts","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001570/","name":"Edward Norton","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000630/","name":"Liev Schreiber"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0192845/","name":"John Curran"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0001146/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0089918/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0107198/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0638913/","name":"Ron Nyswaner","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0560857/","name":"W. programme.title: Spotkania
programme.desc: Cykl prezentujący wyselekcjonowany zbiór najlepszych filmów krótkometrażowych. Wiele z nich nagrodzonych zostało prestiżowymi wyróżnieniami na międzynarodowych galach i festiwalach filmowych. Każde pasmo przedstawia kilka produkcji na dany temat.

programme.title: Ewolucja Jackiego Chana
programme.desc: Kulisy spektakularnej kariery Jackiego Chana. Tego znanego artystę można nazwać człowiekiem instytucją. Oprócz tego że jest cenionym aktorem, pracuje także jako kaskader, scenarzysta i reżyser, a także biznesmen. Jak nikt inny w branży filmowej potrafi widowiskowo łączyć azjatyckie kino sztuk walki z chaplinowskim humorem oraz hollywoodzkim rozmachem.

programme.title: Qu'est-ce qu'on a encore fait au bon Dieu
I znowu zgrzeszyliśmy, dobry Boże!
Qu'est-ce qu'on a encore fait au bon Dieu?
programme.desc:
Qu'est-ce qu'on a encore fait au bon Dieu?: Directed by Philippe de Chauveron. With Christian Clavier, Chantal Lauby, Ary Abittan, Medi Sadoun. Claude and Marie Verneuil face a new crisis: their four daughters' spouses--David, Rachid, Chao, and Charles--have decided to leave France for various reasons. Here they imagine their lives elsewhere." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6556670/","name":"Qu'est-ce qu'on a encore fait au bon Dieu?","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmQ0MTRiNmUtYTAyYi00NGViLWExYjEtYzQwZWEyZWFmMDQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTc5OTMwOTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Claude and Marie Verneuil face a new crisis: their four daughters' spouses--David, Rachid, Chao, and Charles--have decided to leave France for various reasons. Here they imagine their lives elsewhere.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6556670/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"georgioskarpouzas"},"dateCreated":"2019-07-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Treating serious matters in a lighter vein","reviewBody":"Having watched the first movie I decided to give a chance to the second bearing in mind that often the continuation of a successful recipe does not live up to the original movie. This observation was confirmed although the second film is still very funny. I have to admit that it is full of commonplaces and cliches to an annoying degree. The truth is that you laugh and that is the aim of a comedy. There is no originality in the jokes, they are as commonplace and trite as you could imagine but I found myself laughing most of the time.

The plot is simple. The bourgeois elderly couple strives to keep their four daughters in France while the latter under the instigation of their foreign husbands seek to pursue their luck outside their country to destinations linked with the origins of their spouses. The lengths to which the paterfamilias and his wife go to incite their daughters and grooms to remain in France inspire the main comedy effect of the film.

It is important to note that the scenario is very apt concerning current affairs in French society so that anyone closely following developments in French social reality will recognize imediately that important and "heavy" matters dividing national opinion such as immigration, integration and tolerance towards Muslim practices or legalization of homosexual marriage are treated in a lighter vein and produce ample laughter despite their insoluble and often tragic aspects in real life.

I recommend this movie which without being a masterpiece will appeal to those with a vivid interest in the dilemmas of postmodern multicultural society who are ready to put aside for a moment the often tragic connotations of those matters and accept the comic element which is inherent even in the most serious aspects of human social coexistence.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6901,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-01-30","keywords":"sequel,singing in a car,dysfunctional family,reference to donald trump,arab man","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi385595929","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNThjODc0ODItN2MyNC00MWVkLWEzZmQtZTQ0MDlhZWVjZTY2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNThjODc0ODItN2MyNC00MWVkLWEzZmQtZTQ0MDlhZWVjZTY2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002010/","name":"Christian Clavier"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0490702/","name":"Chantal Lauby"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2987278/","name":"Ary Abittan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0154385/","name":"Philippe de Chauveron"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0367060/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0079764/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0718581/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0491230/","name":"Guy Laurent"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0154385/","name":"Philippe de Chauveron"}],"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Bandits
Włamanie na śniadanie
Bandits
programme.desc:
Bandits: Directed by Barry Levinson. With Bruce Willis, Billy Bob Thornton, Cate Blanchett, Troy Garity. Two bank robbers fall in love with the girl they've kidnapped." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0219965/","name":"Bandits","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyMzA3OTI3NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMjU0ODM3._V1_.jpg","description":"Two bank robbers fall in love with the girl they've kidnapped.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0219965/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Herbalicious_690"},"dateCreated":"2004-11-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"If you like your comedy explained and in-your-face, this one is not for you.","reviewBody":"If you like your comedy fully explained and in-your-face, this one is not for you. If you appreciate deeper levels of subtlety and are prepared to suspend hard-nosed reality for the duration, you will love this one. Reminds me of Cohen Bros movies. If you are prepared to relax into it and let the movie take you where IT goes, you are in for a good ride. For those that want to predict a movie and try and show some perceived level of intellectual superiority by telling the person next to them what is about to happen just before it happens (yes - we know they exist), I would hazard a guess that you will not enjoy this movie. 

Having said that, I found the movie beautiful in the detail. This is not about grandiose plot, high speed chases and super cool cunning people. This is accidental and bumbling happenstance where random events are delightfully used. Truck, garage door etc. I carried with me the finer and more easily lost details of each character and I found they surprised me and delighted me with often times whimsical twists and subtle growth/support. I didn't find any huge character surprises or character twists, just good solid development, the kind where you can leave your opinions open to the end. Times like the late night rendezvous at the juke box joint and what happens when Bob tries to dance. Perfect. I walked out with a smile on my face, well amused and very much liking the attention to detail in character, shots, lighting, soundtrack etc. Not edge of the seat, sit back and relax.

Nice one.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":66918,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2001-10-12","keywords":"cousin cousin relationship,reference to bonnie tyler,escape from prison,television star,home invasion","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2371337753","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA4MWRjMTktOTIwNC00ZjczLTkwNDgtNzk4MDdjOTU5NWZiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA4MWRjMTktOTIwNC00ZjczLTkwNDgtNzk4MDdjOTU5NWZiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two bank robbers fall in love with the girl they've kidnapped."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000246/","name":"Bruce Willis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000671/","name":"Billy Bob Thornton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000949/","name":"Cate Blanchett"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001469/","name":"Barry Levinson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0036225/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022018/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0679037/","name":"Harley Peyton"}],"duration":"PT2H3M"}</script><metacontent="

Rozmowy z moim ogrodnikiem
Dialogue avec mon jardinier
programme.desc: Dialogue avec mon jardinier: Directed by Jean Becker. With Daniel Auteuil, Jean-Pierre Darroussin, Fanny Cottençon, Alexia Barlier. A successful artist, weary of Parisian life and on the verge of divorce, returns to the country to live in his childhood house. He needs someone to make a real vegetable garden again out of the wilderness it has become. The gardener happens to be a former schoolfriend. A warm, fruitful conversation starts between the two men..." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0825244/","name":"Dialogue avec mon jardinier","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGNjYmEwZjItY2FkZS00Y2ZhLTliNjMtZmNlYjY5ZjJjMWJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjQzMzQzODY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A successful artist, weary of Parisian life and on the verge of divorce, returns to the country to live in his childhood house. He needs someone to make a real vegetable garden again out of the wilderness it has become. The gardener ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0825244/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"runamokprods"},"dateCreated":"2011-12-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Sweet, simple story","reviewBody":"For a while, this admittedly talky film (the title is quite accurate, it is mostly conversations) bored me a bit. While the two actors are terrific, the stakes didn't seem very high, and some of the talk seemed too 'easy' in it's wisdom; the working class gardener imparting what's really important in life to the upper-class artist. Not a new concept. \n\nBut this is one of those films that gains it's power by accumulation, and by the end of the film, when life has intervened in more dramatic ways, as it inevitably does, I found myself quite touched, if not deeply moved, and looking back on the whole experience of the film with a wistful fondness.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3414,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2007-06-06","keywords":"gardener,divorce,vegetable,love,southern france","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000809/","name":"Daniel Auteuil"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0201669/","name":"Jean-Pierre Darroussin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0182946/","name":"Fanny Cottençon"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0065449/","name":"Jean Becker"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030118/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0077414/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047476/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0065449/","name":"Jean Becker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0181924/","name":"Jean Cosmos"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2244089/","name":"Henri Cueco"}],"duration":"PT1H49M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0825244, Title: Dialogue avec mon jardinier, --- Description: Dialogue avec mon jardinier: Directed by Jean Becker. With Daniel Auteuil, Jean-Pierre Darroussin, Fanny Cottençon, Alexia Barlier. A successful artist, weary of Parisian life and on the verge of divorce, returns to the country to live in his childhood house. He needs someone to make a real vegetable garden again out of the wilderness it has become. The gardener happens to be a former schoolfriend. A warm, fruitful conversation starts between the two men..." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0825244/","name":"Dialogue avec mon jardinier","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGNjYmEwZjItY2FkZS00Y2ZhLTliNjMtZmNlYjY5ZjJjMWJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjQzMzQzODY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A successful artist, weary of Parisian life and on the verge of divorce, returns to the country to live in his childhood house. The gardener ","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0825244/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"runamokprods","dateCreated":"2011-12-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Sweet, simple story","reviewBody":"For a while, this admittedly talky film (the title is quite accurate, it is mostly conversations) bored me a bit. While the two actors are terrific, the stakes didn't seem very high, and some of the talk seemed too 'easy' in it's wisdom; the working class gardener imparting what's really important in life to the upper-class artist. Not a new concept. \n\nBut this is one of those films that gains it's power by accumulation, and by the end of the film, when life has intervened in more dramatic ways, as it inevitably does, I found myself quite touched, if not deeply moved, and looking back on the whole experience of the film with a wistful fondness.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3414,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1,"genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2007-06-06","keywords":"gardener,divorce,vegetable,love,southern france","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000809/","name":"Daniel Auteuil","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0201669/","name":"Jean-Pierre Darroussin","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0182946/","name":"Fanny Cottençon"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0065449/","name":"Jean Becker"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030118/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0077414/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047476/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0065449/","name":"Jean Becker","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0181924/","name":"Jean Cosmos","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2244089/","name":"Henri Cueco"],"duration":"PT1H49M"</script><metacontent="

He gets a class action lawsuit against an automaker after some cars explode. On the opposite side is his estranged daughter Maggie Ward (Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio). She is ambitious eager to push for partnership in her firm. They don't get along since she discovered his cheating. She also claims that he abandons his clients after winning his cases. He had maintained his marriage. His wife Estelle tries to bridge the gap between father and daughter but she dies suddenly. Nick Holbrook (Larry Fishburne) is Jed's longtime assistant.\n\nThese are two top class actors. Director Michael Apted asks them for family dysfunction and they deliver. The movie lays out the situation but it doesn't have much movement after the mother's death. The court case is basic and has limited drama. The personal drama also doesn't make much movement. This is a movie with a world of potential but does little more than expected.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7313,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1991-03-15","keywords":"judicial,judiciary,judicial system,foxvideo,man uses a wheelchair","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000432/","name":"Gene Hackman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001512/","name":"Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0295506/","name":"Colin Friels"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000776/","name":"Michael Apted"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0031772/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0790960/","name":"Carolyn Shelby"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0024686/","name":"Christopher Ames"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0787154/","name":"Samantha Shad"}],"duration":"PT1H50M"}</script><metacontent="

A jaded psychotherapist returns to her first passion of becoming a writer." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9173264/","name":"Sibyl","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDY3MmQ3NzMtYTUxMi00ZWQzLThjNmYtNmE5MjUyYTU1MGRmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"A jaded psychotherapist returns to her first passion of becoming a writer.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9173264/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"shanbhattacharya_"},"dateCreated":"2019-11-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"A surprisingly crafty take on an otherwise boring subject.","reviewBody":"I was somewhat skeptical before entering the theater, thinking it would turn out to be another boring film about white people surrendering themselves to hordes of therapists, french woman suffering from romantic distress and so on. However, the writer/director cleverly managed to create a layered portrayal of the protagonist shrink and the world she lives in - blending in her present life, her past, the fiction novel she's writing and the movie her patient stars in. The script is mature, quirky and unpredictable enough to handle these four layers without becoming pointless and confusing. The performances are stellar, especially of Sandra Huller as the temperamental film director.\n\nThere is no dearth of past french films handling similar material. Yet somehow this film appears fresh and profusely entertaining.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2673,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-05-24","keywords":"nudity,female nudity,bare breasts,sex scene,one word title","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Sibyl","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3410673177","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgzMmNhN2UtOWQ4MC00NGE1LTkzZTEtNmUzZTE3N2U3MDExXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgzMmNhN2UtOWQ4MC00NGE1LTkzZTEtNmUzZTE3N2U3MDExXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1812637/","name":"Virginie Efira"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2650819/","name":"Adèle Exarchopoulos"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0880484/","name":"Gaspard Ulliel"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2630323/","name":"Justine Triet"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0275730/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056755/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0258767/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1932959/","name":"Arthur Harari"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1797444/","name":"David H. programme.title: Pi
Pi
programme.desc:
Pi: Directed by Darren Aronofsky. With Sean Gullette, Mark Margolis, Ben Shenkman, Pamela Hart. A paranoid mathematician searches for a key number that will unlock the universal patterns found in nature." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0138704/","name":"Pi","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjYzNTA4YzItYTQ2Yy00NDQwLWI2OGItN2JmMjZhZTVhMzI5L2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTAyODkwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A paranoid mathematician searches for a key number that will unlock the universal patterns found in nature.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0138704/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"quixoboy"},"dateCreated":"2003-10-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Genius!","reviewBody":"I have yet to come even close to fully appreciating the sheer artistry and complexity of Darren Aronofsky's stunning mathematical/sci-fi thriller, "Pi". Watching this film, one can tell from the subdued effects, grainy black-and-white filter, and guerrilla-style filmmaking that this must be a low-budget independent film - NOT to try and downplay its impact, as many independent films can clearly surpass any typical Hollywood movie, in terms of style and subject matter.

"Pi" is a perfectly concrete example of how the relative absence of special effects, explosions, etc. can still help create an engaging, and thoroughly unique viewing experience. Overflowing with intensity and hyperkinetic camerawork, this is a frightening roller-coaster ride of a film; despite clocking in at less than 90 minutes, "Pi" is by no means short on resonance - but rather leaves a heavy feeling of exuberance and fascination with the material that lasts long after it's finished. At the same time, though, people who aren't as open-minded to more obscure, abstract films like this would be, I think, surprised. This is not as complicated or bewildering a film as I had expected. If one can be able to focus intently on the story, the result is rewarding, and doesn't provide for much head-scratching. Its style seems rather modern, rather hip...at times it reminded me of "The Matrix" (which, ironically, was released the FOLLOWING year) what with its slick techno musical score and its flashy opening credits.

To shy away from this film simply because of its math content is to be completely shallow and ignorant. The way it handles the material is a whole lot more interesting than you'd probably think. Like "A Beautiful Mind", "Pi" is an instant classic that serves to re-awaken my erratic interests in my poorest subject, mathematics. IMDb data; ttnr: 0138704, Title: Pi, --- Description: Pi: Directed by Darren Aronofsky. With Sean Gullette, Mark Margolis, Ben Shenkman, Pamela Hart. A paranoid mathematician searches for a key number that will unlock the universal patterns found in nature." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0138704/","name":"Pi","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjYzNTA4YzItYTQ2Yy00NDQwLWI2OGItN2JmMjZhZTVhMzI5L2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTAyODkwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A paranoid mathematician searches for a key number that will unlock the universal patterns found in nature.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0138704/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"quixoboy","dateCreated":"2003-10-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Genius!","reviewBody":"I have yet to come even close to fully appreciating the sheer artistry and complexity of Darren Aronofsky's stunning mathematical/sci-fi thriller, "Pi". Watching this film, one can tell from the subdued effects, grainy black-and-white filter, and guerrilla-style filmmaking that this must be a low-budget independent film - NOT to try and downplay its impact, as many independent films can clearly surpass any typical Hollywood movie, in terms of style and subject matter.

"Pi" is a perfectly concrete example of how the relative absence of special effects, explosions, etc. can still help create an engaging, and thoroughly unique viewing experience. Overflowing with intensity and hyperkinetic camerawork, this is a frightening roller-coaster ride of a film; despite clocking in at less than 90 minutes, "Pi" is by no means short on resonance - but rather leaves a heavy feeling of exuberance and fascination with the material that lasts long after it's finished. At the same time, though, people who aren't as open-minded to more obscure, abstract films like this would be, I think, surprised. This is not as complicated or bewildering a film as I had expected. If one can be able to focus intently on the story, the result is rewarding, and doesn't provide for much head-scratching. Its style seems rather modern, rather hip...at times it reminded me of "The Matrix" (which, ironically, was released the FOLLOWING year) what with its slick techno musical score and its flashy opening credits.

To shy away from this film simply because of its math content is to be completely shallow and ignorant. The way it handles the material is a whole lot more interesting than you'd probably think. Like "A Beautiful Mind", "Pi" is an instant classic that serves to re-awaken my erratic interests in my poorest subject, mathematics. It's original, it's interesting, and above all - genius.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":174127,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"1998-07-10","keywords":"cult film,the letter pi,mathematician,headache,torah","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Pi","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1904214297","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTZkNWU3YjgtZTg4Ni00MzA1LThkODItZDMyZmNkODlmOWYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTZkNWU3YjgtZTg4Ni00MzA1LThkODItZDMyZmNkODlmOWYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Artisan","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0347797/","name":"Sean Gullette","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0546797/","name":"Mark Margolis","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0791570/","name":"Ben Shenkman"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004716/","name":"Darren Aronofsky"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0145522/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0076907/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0145523/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004716/","name":"Darren Aronofsky","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0347797/","name":"Sean Gullette","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0914615/","name":"Eric Watson"],"duration":"PT1H24M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Spitsbergen
programme.desc: Magda (Magdalena Czerwińska), zawieszona ratowniczka medyczna, otrzymuje nagłe wezwanie. Oznacza to dla niej powrót do dramatycznych wydarzeń i ludzkich tragedii. Gdy opada poziom adrenaliny, kobieta przypomina sobie podróże na Spitsbergen - mroźną norweską wyspę na Morzu Arktycznym. To miejsce stało się dla niej powodem traumy, z którą do tej pory nie zdołała się uporać. Przerastają ją cudze nieszczęścia i własna przeszłość.

programme.title: Szczescie swiata
Szczęście świata
programme.desc:
Szczescie swiata: Directed by Michal Rosa. With Karolina Gruszka, Mateusz Lickindorf, Grzegorz Palkowski, Dariusz Chojnacki. A journalist from Warsaw travels to Silesia and manages to find a tenement house full of exceptional inhabitants." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6104188/","name":"Szczescie swiata","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDQ3OTUzZWYtYTFlNi00Y2FhLWFmMDEtMGNkOGU2OTZlYWVjL2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A journalist from Warsaw travels to Silesia and manages to find a tenement house full of exceptional inhabitants.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6104188/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Red-125"},"dateCreated":"2017-11-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Excellent--but unusual--Polish film","reviewBody":"The Polish film Szczescie swiata (2016) was shown in the U.S. with the title The Happiness of the World. It was written and directed by Michal Rosa.

The movie is set in 1939 in an apartment house in Silesia--an area of Poland close to the German border. The apartment house itself is unusual. It's clearly not far from a city, but it sits in lonely isolation in a field. It's a very upscale place, and most of the people who live in it are middle or upper class. It's not what we in the U.S. would call a tenement, with poor people making ends meet. It's very elegant.

The plot centers around a journalist from a large city who is sent to the area to track down an elusive bestselling author. This search is more or less just a way to begin the story. When the reporter arrives, his first meeting is with the beautiful Róza, portrayed by Karolina Gruszka. 

Róza has many charms, which she openly displays to the reporter, as well as to any other man who joins her. In turn, director Rosa openly displays Gruszka's charms to his audience. We can all see why she's called "The Happiness of the World."

The movie plot is actually a series of vignettes. Each inhabitant of the apartment building has her or his own story. To a certain extent, the stories intersect, because all of the characters live in the same place. The pivotal figure in all of this is Róza. Karolina Gruszka isn't just another pretty face. She's an extraordinary actor, who is well known in Poland. The movie will rise or fall depending on Gruszka's presence on the screen. She's great, and the film rises accordingly.

We watched this movie in Rochester's excellent Little Theatre. It will work well on the small screen. The film was shown at the outstanding 2017 Rochester Polish Film Festival. After the film, director Rosa was in attendance for a Q&A session. (He doesn't speak English, but the interpreter who worked with him was superb.) My compliments to the PFF for bringing the director to Rochester.

For me, the most striking aspect of the Q&A was Mr. Rosa's discussion of magical realism. I believe that everyone in the audience noted magical realism in the movie. Director Rosa says that it isn't magical realism--it's just realism. I'm not sure if he was joking with us when he said that, or whether he actually believes that the type of events he shows us aren't magical at all. You'll have to watch the movie to see what you think about this realism.

P.S. The Happiness of the World has a dismal IMDb rating of 6.3. It's a much, much better movie than that. Again, you'll have to watch the movie and then decide for yourself.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":124,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2016-12-23","keywords":"silesia,bathtub,femme fatale","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0344734/","name":"Karolina Gruszka"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8475166/","name":"Mateusz Lickindorf"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2707614/","name":"Grzegorz Palkowski"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0740853/","name":"Michal Rosa"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0330220/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049230/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0577510/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0740853/","name":"Michal Rosa"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

It is captivating from the very get-go, keeping the viewing audience as hostage to the very end. programme.title: Code of the Freaks
Kodeks dziwolągów
Code of the Freaks
programme.desc: Code of the Freaks: Directed by Salome Chasnoff. With Lawrence Carter-Long, Candace Coleman, Mike Ervin, Mat Fraser. This documentary examines the representation of disabled people in Hollywood movies." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10411858/","name":"Code of the Freaks","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDEwMWU5ZjQtMjgyYS00M2RmLWEyYzYtMDM1ZmYzNWM3MTRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDU4MTQ0Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"This documentary examines the representation of disabled people in Hollywood movies.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10411858/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jramirez-66906"},"dateCreated":"2021-01-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Most Accurate Documentary About Disability in the Movies","reviewBody":"The documentary examines the misconceptions about the portrayal of characters with disabilities in the movies from actual advocates, writers, actors and historians who have examined more than 100 years of the cinema's view on disability. I found the range of topics going from: sex and disability, race and disability, the false message of inspirational story of a disabled person, deaf character stereotypes, blind character stereotypes, blindness as a superpower, and the so-called "happy ending" or resolution to a story of a character with a disability. The so-called "happy ending" can go in two or three ways: the disabled person has to be killed or cut off from life to restore order, the disabled person is institutionalized as a way to protect themselves from the outside world, or the disabled person is cured and does not need any form of special needs or guidance in the world. It is an insightful and in-depth documentary that makes you want to re-think about how Hollywood and movie's portrayal of disabled characters in movies can not only be misleading, but also dangerous to the disabled community in general. Hollywood must not rely on the same old stories of relying on disabled people as inspirational or cliched-stereotypes of characters who are villainous or victimized or pitied. But, one day that there will be a film with actual disabled people that are not inspirational, but living their daily lives in a humorous or ironic way that makes fun of the formula. That would be my ideal film to see when it gets made and put into a screening or a theater.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"genre":["Documentary"],"datePublished":"2020-04-01","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi853852185","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzU0MWU3OWItNzRiYi00ZDNhLWE2NGUtNGU2ZjM4MDJmMGY3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzU0MWU3OWItNzRiYi00ZDNhLWE2NGUtNGU2ZjM4MDJmMGY3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Original accessible trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4526433/","name":"Lawrence Carter-Long"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11657129/","name":"Candace Coleman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11657130/","name":"Mike Ervin"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3435265/","name":"Salome Chasnoff"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10730500/","name":"Susan Nussbaum"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10730499/","name":"Alyson Patsavas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10730498/","name":"Carrie Sandahl"}],"duration":"PT1H8M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Faites sauter la banque
Napad na bank
Faites sauter la banque!
programme.desc: Faites sauter la banque!: Directed by Jean Girault. With Louis de Funès, Yvonne Clech, Jean-Pierre Marielle, Anne Doat. A grouchy shopkeeper made an unsuccessful financial investment, and now he is on the verge of bankruptcy. In order to avenge oneself he engages his own family into a plan to rob a next door bank." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0057051/","name":"Faites sauter la banque!","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjE1NDM2YzUtMjY1OC00NTdkLTg3MWYtOTk2Y2RiMWQ3N2Q5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTgxOTIzNzk@._V1_.jpg","description":"A grouchy shopkeeper made an unsuccessful financial investment, and now he is on the verge of bankruptcy. In order to avenge oneself he engages his own family into a plan to rob a next door bank.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0057051/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"languedoc-586-836028"},"dateCreated":"2018-11-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Brilliant (changed my rating from 8 to 9 upon second viewing)!","reviewBody":"This is a surrealistic comedy, and it doesn't matter that its plot and situational developments are far-fetched. The director here is Jean Girault, who did some of the best De Funès films (and in particular some of the best from the Gendarme series). Fast-paced, brilliantly acted, hilarious... The banker from the start is guilty of insider trading BTW (which the Storyline here does not mention). This is necessary to make us sympathize at least basically with De Funès in his criminal undertaking to right wrong-doing, with the unlikely complicity of his incredible family. All terrific actors BTW.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2071,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"genre":["Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"1964-02-25","keywords":"tunneling,spoof,bank heist,stock fraud,tough girl","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000086/","name":"Louis de Funès"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0165915/","name":"Yvonne Clech"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0547339/","name":"Jean-Pierre Marielle"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0320833/","name":"Jean Girault"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0032877/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010669/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0897505/","name":"Jacques Vilfrid"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0320833/","name":"Jean Girault"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0764583/","name":"Louis Sapin"}],"duration":"PT1H28M"}</script><metacontent="

In order to avenge oneself he engages his own family into a plan to rob a next door bank.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0057051/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"languedoc-586-836028","dateCreated":"2018-11-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Brilliant (changed my rating from 8 to 9 upon second viewing)!","reviewBody":"This is a surrealistic comedy, and it doesn't matter that its plot and situational developments are far-fetched. The director here is Jean Girault, who did some of the best De Funès films (and in particular some of the best from the Gendarme series). Fast-paced, brilliantly acted, hilarious... The banker from the start is guilty of insider trading BTW (which the Storyline here does not mention). This is necessary to make us sympathize at least basically with De Funès in his criminal undertaking to right wrong-doing, with the unlikely complicity of his incredible family. All terrific actors BTW.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2071,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7,"genre":["Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"1964-02-25","keywords":"tunneling,spoof,bank heist,stock fraud,tough girl","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000086/","name":"Louis de Funès","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0165915/","name":"Yvonne Clech","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0547339/","name":"Jean-Pierre Marielle"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0320833/","name":"Jean Girault"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0032877/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010669/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0897505/","name":"Jacques Vilfrid","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0320833/","name":"Jean Girault","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0764583/","name":"Louis Sapin"],"duration":"PT1H28M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Cold Fusion
Zimna fuzja
Cold Fusion
programme.desc: Cold Fusion: Directed by Ivan Mitov. With Adrian Paul, Sarah Brown, Michelle Lee, William Hope. In 1979 a UFO is spotted over Ukrainian territory in the Soviet Union. A squadron of MIG23 fighters are dispatched to intercept it." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1678042/","name":"Cold Fusion","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODkzMjJjOGUtNTVjNi00MzhhLWFkMDMtMDlhNjMwNWEzMTUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE2MjcyNjg@._V1_.jpg","description":"In 1979 a UFO is spotted over Ukrainian territory in the Soviet Union. A squadron of MIG23 fighters are dispatched to intercept it.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1678042/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"unbrokenmetal"},"dateCreated":"2011-07-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Flying saucer recycled","reviewBody":"A flying saucer once crashed in the Soviet Union; a few decades later, villains want to exploit the bits and pieces of alien technology to create weapons and make the occasional terrorist attack when they're bored on a Tuesday afternoon. Enter Xena (Sarah Brown) and Lara Croft (Michelle Lee), or at least that's what they look like, kick the s**t out of the baddies and blow up half of the Ukrainian location. Adrian Paul meanwhile is busy clarifying who is behind the conspiracy.\n\nUmmm, yeah, right: it's silly, no denying, but it has its amusing moments. An action flick I'd consider watching again some time. It gives aliens another good reason to avoid this barbarian planet, though. Earthlings find advanced technology, and all they can think of is super-weapons? Give me something new. Voted 5/10, still."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":458,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.3},"genre":["Action","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2011-02-23","keywords":"fighter","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001600/","name":"Adrian Paul"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1931990/","name":"Sarah Brown"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1685477/","name":"Michelle Lee"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2329969/","name":"Ivan Mitov"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0201678/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1405911/","name":"Nate Atkins"}],"duration":"PT1H24M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Britannic
Britannic
programme.desc:
Britannic: Directed by Brian Trenchard-Smith. With Edward Atterton, Amanda Ryan, Jacqueline Bisset, Ben Daniels. A fictional account of the sinking of the H.M.H.S. Britannic off the Greek island of Kea in November 1916. This explores the theory of a German Agent sabotaging the liner, a hospital ship." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0190281/","name":"Britannic","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQzMzE0MDI0Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTU0ODEzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A fictional account of the sinking of the H.M.H.S. Britannic off the Greek island of Kea in November 1916. This explores the theory of a German Agent sabotaging the liner, a hospital ship.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0190281/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"comquest"},"dateCreated":"2000-01-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Sinks Faster Than Titanic","reviewBody":"At the end of this Fox Family Channel original movie, you find out that Titanic's sister ship, the Britannic, actually sank in 51 minutes -- twice as fast as Titanic.

Unfortunately, the movie sails for two hours and the plot begins taking on water long before the ship does. It becomes tiresome and plodding at times and, although a few scenes are compelling, the film fails to generate the excitement that one would expect from a "based on fact" sea tale.

The good news is that only 30 people lost their lives when the real Britannic went down. Far more died of boredom while watching this slow-moving flick.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1324,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.2},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2000-01-10","keywords":"kea,tzia,keos,greek cyclades,aegean","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0041029/","name":"Edward Atterton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0752406/","name":"Amanda Ryan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000302/","name":"Jacqueline Bisset"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0872062/","name":"Brian Trenchard-Smith"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0063686/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0015207/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0859920/","name":"Brett Thompson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0808993/","name":"Kim Owen Smith"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0695446/","name":"Dennis A. programme.title: Ardennes Fury
Ardennes Fury
programme.desc: Ardennes Fury: Directed by Joseph J. Lawson. With Tom Stedham, Bill Voorhees, Tino Struckmann, Larry Gamell Jr.. As the Battle of the Bulge rages on, an American tank unit gets trapped behind Nazi lines. With just hours before the bombs of Operation Ardennes Fury fall, the tank's commander makes the risky decision to rescue an orphanage." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3922754/","name":"Ardennes Fury","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTAzODQ0MjEwMjZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDQ4MzUzNDIx._V1_.jpg","description":"As the Battle of the Bulge rages on, an American tank unit gets trapped behind Nazi lines. With just hours before the bombs of Operation Ardennes Fury fall, the tank's commander makes the risky decision to rescue an orphanage.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3922754/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"rick-877-440458"},"dateCreated":"2016-10-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Who needs historical accuracy?","reviewBody":"Worst WWII movie I have seen, unwatchable. I had to stop after just six minutes because of the historical inaccuracies.\n\n* Germans fighting in what were obviously Soviet T-34 tanks * The "German" T-34s even had the invasion stripes on the turrets even though the fight was out in a field near some forest. The stripes were only used during the invasion of Berlin. * Three Tiger tanks were lined up abreast with maybe a meter between them. In fact two looked like their treads were touching they were so close together. * The editing made it look like one Sherman Easy Eight took out a Tiger with a frontal shot * The Sherman and the tiger were both in the open and maybe 50 meters apart at best."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":880,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":2.3},"contentRating":"Unrated","genre":["Action","War"],"datePublished":"2014-11-11","keywords":"soldier,u.s. soldier,world war two soldier,military,20th century","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2067192/","name":"Tom Stedham"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1387894/","name":"Bill Voorhees"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1559935/","name":"Tino Struckmann"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0493295/","name":"Joseph J. Lawson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042909/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2645772/","name":"Frank Arend"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0493295/","name":"Joseph J. Lawson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3603646/","name":"Stephen Llorens"}],"duration":"PT1H27M"}</script><metacontent="

In a mythical kingdom, a young boy must fight time for the love of his princess and the future of his land." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0117929/","name":"To the Ends of Time","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTc3YjViYWUtMThhZS00NGNiLTliYjEtMTA2MDIxYTBhMjIyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzMzMjU5NDY@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a mythical kingdom, a young boy must fight time for the love of his princess and the future of his land.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0117929/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"my_little_angel_Michael"},"dateCreated":"2008-01-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Must have","reviewBody":"This is a great movie, a must own. I really liked every aspect of it, from the sword fighting, the romance, the costumes were really well done and put together. The scenery is absolutely beautiful. I also loved the mystery and magic. Also the message of the power of love, that love is the greatest power there is. I really like the heart of the king in the sense that he desires peace instead of the bloodshed and hate. I wish that I could live in a world like that with flying ships, to castles in the sky. I also think that it was really nice how they brought the animals into the movie. I also thought that the cook was really funny. I have watched it many times in one day and still never tire of it. Just wish they would bring it onto a DVD.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":195,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.9},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Fantasy"],"datePublished":"1996-11-30","keywords":"sword and sorcery","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000722/","name":"Joss Ackland"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0852132/","name":"Christine Taylor"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0776365/","name":"Tom Schultz"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0745209/","name":"Markus Rothkranz"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0013199/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0072913/","name":"Daniel Benton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0745209/","name":"Markus Rothkranz"}],"duration":"PT1H32M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Space Truckers
Kowboje przestrzeni
Space Truckers
programme.desc:
Space Truckers: Directed by Stuart Gordon. With Tim Loane, Ian Beattie, Olwen Fouéré, Shane Rimmer. A space trucker and his cute fiancee are on their way from a space station to Earth with an unknown cargo. When space pirates hijack them, 5000 disintegrator robots are found in the cargo." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0120199/","name":"Space Truckers","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjZkMzkxMzgtNmZhMC00ODc3LTllMmYtMTRlODhiZjBjOWU1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A space trucker and his cute fiancee are on their way from a space station to Earth with an unknown cargo. When space pirates hijack them, 5000 disintegrator robots are found in the cargo.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0120199/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"krachtm"},"dateCreated":"2012-12-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Stupidly awesome","reviewBody":"The plot: Space truckers run into problems with space pirates, space politicians, and killer robots (who, technically, are not space robots).

Space Truckers is essentially a low budget, B movie space opera that's a parody of low budget, B movie space operas. It's full of cheesy lines, cheesy set design, and cheesy special effects. In fact, it's such a cheesy movie that it sometimes makes The Rocky Horror Picture Show look like The Godfather. At its heart, this movie is stupid, pointless, mindless, and has nothing to say about the human condition, except that it's funny to laugh at bad movies. If you're a Stuart Gordon fan, that's probably enough for you to enjoy this. As an added bonus, it's got a great cast, including many B movie veterans.

It can be enjoyed as either a so-bad-it's-good B movie or a clever parody. Like most Stuart Gordon films, it has rather narrow demographic appeal, and people who are not genre fans (or Stuart Gordon fans) are likely to hate it. I love Stanley Kubrick as much as the next film snob, but the world also needs ridiculous movies like Space Truckers and The Toxic Avenger. In fact, this movie is something of a marriage between Troma and New World Pictures. If you're unfamiliar with those studios -- or you dislike their copious output -- I'd strongly warn you away from this film. Space Truckers was reviled by the critics, rejected by audiences, and thought to be unintentionally funny by B movie fans. Well, for the true believers, this is an awesome movie, and nothing will ever convince us otherwise. Such is the cult of Stuart Gordon!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7366,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Sci-Fi"],"keywords":"b movie,triton,neptune,defensive line,severed foot","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Space Truckers","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2610102553","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDlmNDRiMDgtYmVmNy00MGU1LWI2MGMtYTZmMWMzYTBhODVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDlmNDRiMDgtYmVmNy00MGU1LWI2MGMtYTZmMWMzYTBhODVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Sterling Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0516385/","name":"Tim Loane"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0064155/","name":"Ian Beattie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0288260/","name":"Olwen Fouéré"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002340/","name":"Stuart Gordon"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0045569/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0078216/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0156955/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1949279/","name":"Ted Mann"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002340/","name":"Stuart Gordon"}],"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

Space Truckers is essentially a low budget, B movie space opera that's a parody of low budget, B movie space operas. It's full of cheesy lines, cheesy set design, and cheesy special effects. programme.title: The Forgotten
Życie, którego nie było
The Forgotten
programme.desc:
The Forgotten: Directed by Joseph Ruben. With Julianne Moore, Christopher Kovaleski, Matthew Pleszewicz, Anthony Edwards. After being told that their children never existed, a man and woman soon discover there is a much bigger enemy at work." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0356618/","name":"The Forgotten","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAwMjIyNjU4NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjE3NjYyMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"After being told that their children never existed, a man and woman soon discover there is a much bigger enemy at work.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0356618/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"suspiria10"},"dateCreated":"2005-01-30","inLanguage":"English","name":""I believe", Scully...","reviewBody":"Telly Paretta is seeing a shrink as therapy for losing her son in a plane crash, only she never had a son but is convinced she had. All the people in her life don't remember Sam including her husband. When she confronts the alcoholic fathers of another child from the flight they set out to discover the truth and the truth is "out there".

Part X-Files and part Lifetime movie of the week, "The Forgotten" seems to really channel Chris Carter's hit TV show, look it even has a redhead. The story is interesting and Julianne Moore's performance is sincere but you can't help but think that something is missing. The clever twist is good but they could have easily expanded the storyline and made it more "something".

Good but not great, "The Forgotten" seems to lack its own identity due to the derivative nature of the storyline which needed a bit of assistance from Fox Mulder.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":65041,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Mystery","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2004-12-08","keywords":"abduction,conspiracy,mother son relationship,children,therapy","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Forgotten","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1626472729","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2NkMmU5YjctNWI2OC00M2ZjLWE3YTUtNmUxY2U0ZTg2MTM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2NkMmU5YjctNWI2OC00M2ZjLWE3YTUtNmUxY2U0ZTg2MTM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000194/","name":"Julianne Moore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0922035/","name":"Dominic West"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1468254/","name":"Christopher Kovaleski"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0747849/","name":"Joseph Ruben"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003580/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0021095/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0090778/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0224187/","name":"Gerald Di Pego"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

Stealing Harvard
programme.desc: Stealing Harvard: Directed by Bruce McCulloch. With Jason Lee, Tom Green, Leslie Mann, Megan Mullally. A middle-class man turns to a life of crime in order to finance his niece's first year at Harvard University." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0265808/","name":"Stealing Harvard","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjZhMGIyNGMtN2NmYy00OTBhLWE3NWQtMGQ3ZmNmZGUwMDg1L2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A middle-class man turns to a life of crime in order to finance his niece's first year at Harvard University.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0265808/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MLDinTN"},"dateCreated":"2003-09-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"a silly comedy that works","reviewBody":"Call me crazy, but I liked this movie. It had its moments. I especially liked Elaine's dad; his character was the funniest. The part where John and Mr. Warner end up in drag at the judge's house was so funny. Then the end was great when John writes I have the picture, and the judge lets him off. And all the silly ideas John and Duff come up with to get the money were quite entertaining. I liked the fact that for once, Tom Green didn't play a gross out character.\n\nFINAL VERDICT: This is a comedy worth seeing. It's only about 80 minutes long, but that's about right for a Tom Green movie."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12890,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"2002-09-13","keywords":"man wears eyeglasses,harvard,black comedy,crying during sex,voice over narration","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Stealing Harvard","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4237989913","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWIzMmYwNTQtYWM2Ni00NWM2LWJmODMtY2ZkNWE3OWJhZTcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWIzMmYwNTQtYWM2Ni00NWM2LWJmODMtY2ZkNWE3OWJhZTcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Stealing Harvard"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005134/","name":"Jason Lee"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0338381/","name":"Tom Green"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005182/","name":"Leslie Mann"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0567126/","name":"Bruce McCulloch"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003580/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003687/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0405271/","name":"Martin Hynes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0865847/","name":"Peter Tolan"}],"duration":"PT1H25M"}</script><metacontent="

I liked the fact that for once, Tom Green didn't play a gross out character.\n\nFINAL VERDICT: This is a comedy worth seeing.
