programme.title: Zloto dezerterów
Złoto dezerterów
programme.desc:
Zloto dezerterów: Directed by Janusz Majewski. With Marek Kondrat, Boguslaw Linda, Wiktor Zborowski, Katarzyna Figura. During World War II a group of safe-crackers sets off on a mission to steal gold from a Nazi bank." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0191666/","name":"Zloto dezerterów","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzM4OTI4ZGUtNmQyZS00NjZiLWE4OWUtNDA3Y2RkOGE4ZTkzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"During World War II a group of safe-crackers sets off on a mission to steal gold from a Nazi bank.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0191666/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Maziun"},"dateCreated":"2013-08-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Bad sequel to fun movie","reviewBody":"This is a sequel to movie from 1985 – HK Deserters" . The heroes from the first movie also appear here , but there is plenty of new heroes . The first movie was a war comedy about a group of friends running away from army . This one is supposed to be a war comedy about stealing gold from Nazi's.

It was supposed to be comedy . Unfortunately the movie takes itself way too seriously . The movie unnecessary tries to tell something about anti-Semitism , betrayal and courage of freedom fighters. For more than half of the movie is hard to tell that this is comedy . When the so-called jokes appear in the second half of the movie they so awful you will groan. The movie also feels too long (it's 2 hours long ) , which wasn't a problem in the first movie (which was almost 3 hours long) . Gone is the charm and the fun of original.

The acting is good and the music is very jolly . Still , it's too little to save the movie from being a disaster. I give it 1/10. Better watch "Kelly's heroes". Or the original – "HK Deserters".","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":487,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5},"genre":["Action","Comedy","War"],"datePublished":"1998-12-04","keywords":"1940s,world war two","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0464945/","name":"Marek Kondrat"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0511277/","name":"Boguslaw Linda"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0953975/","name":"Wiktor Zborowski"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0538105/","name":"Janusz Majewski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0538105/","name":"Janusz Majewski"}],"duration":"PT2H3M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0191666, Title: Zloto dezerterów, --- Description: Zloto dezerterów: Directed by Janusz Majewski. With Marek Kondrat, Boguslaw Linda, Wiktor Zborowski, Katarzyna Figura. During World War II a group of safe-crackers sets off on a mission to steal gold from a Nazi bank." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0191666/","name":"Zloto dezerterów","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzM4OTI4ZGUtNmQyZS00NjZiLWE4OWUtNDA3Y2RkOGE4ZTkzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"During World War II a group of safe-crackers sets off on a mission to steal gold from a Nazi bank.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0191666/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Maziun","dateCreated":"2013-08-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Bad sequel to fun movie","reviewBody":"This is a sequel to movie from 1985 – HK Deserters" . The heroes from the first movie also appear here , but there is plenty of new heroes . The first movie was a war comedy about a group of friends running away from army . This one is supposed to be a war comedy about stealing gold from Nazi's.

It was supposed to be comedy . Unfortunately the movie takes itself way too seriously . The movie unnecessary tries to tell something about anti-Semitism , betrayal and courage of freedom fighters. For more than half of the movie is hard to tell that this is comedy . When the so-called jokes appear in the second half of the movie they so awful you will groan. The movie also feels too long (it's 2 hours long ) , which wasn't a problem in the first movie (which was almost 3 hours long) . Gone is the charm and the fun of original.

The acting is good and the music is very jolly . Still , it's too little to save the movie from being a disaster. I give it 1/10. Better watch "Kelly's heroes". Or the original – "HK Deserters".","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":487,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5,"genre":["Action","Comedy","War"],"datePublished":"1998-12-04","keywords":"1940s,world war two","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0464945/","name":"Marek Kondrat","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0511277/","name":"Boguslaw Linda","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0953975/","name":"Wiktor Zborowski"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0538105/","name":"Janusz Majewski"],"creator":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0538105/","name":"Janusz Majewski"],"duration":"PT2H3M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Congress
Kongres
The Congress
programme.desc:
The Congress: Directed by Ari Folman. With Robin Wright, Harvey Keitel, Sami Gayle, Jon Hamm. An aging, out-of-work actress accepts one last job, though the consequences of her decision affect her in ways she didn't consider." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1821641/","name":"The Congress","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE5MTUzNDk3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTUwNTQ5MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An aging, out-of-work actress accepts one last job, though the consequences of her decision affect her in ways she didn't consider.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1821641/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Jithindurden"},"dateCreated":"2017-12-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Ari Folman is a genius","reviewBody":"The first 40 minutes of the films are in live action where Robin Wright plays a version of herself who's promising acting career didn't really flesh out after her success in the 80's and 90's while her while taking care of her family and the film industry is revolutionizing itself by using scans of actors to make films. Then for the next hour, it turns into an animated film which stays close to the novel The Futurological Congress, a completely surreal experience.

The first stands as a commentary on how the film industry is exploiting artists and the fascist standpoint of the studios along with all the ethical and moral conundrums. But it's when the animated section starts that we understand that it's actually a much wider problem we are seeing here, it's not just the film industry but the whole world that is forgetting the true nature of being human and is embracing the virtual world of lies.

Although it throws some of its concept on your face and may feel a little over ambitious to some it's an epic journey that is truly a unique experience. Ari Folman is definitely a genius helming films like this one and Waltz With Bashir","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":18083,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Animation","Drama","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2013-07-03","keywords":"female protagonist,satire,dystopia,cinema,tom cruise character","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"International Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi892512537","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjk1ODkwNzMwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjU3NDAwMDE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjk1ODkwNzMwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjU3NDAwMDE@._V1_.jpg","description":" 	An aging, out-of-work actress accepts one last job, though the consequences of her decision affect her in ways she didn't consider"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000705/","name":"Robin Wright"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000172/","name":"Harvey Keitel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0358316/","name":"Jon Hamm"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0284369/","name":"Ari Folman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0232356/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0052813/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054609/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501015/","name":"Stanislaw Lem"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0284369/","name":"Ari Folman"}],"duration":"PT2H2M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Aktualności filmowe+
programme.desc: W cotygodniowym programie zostają przedstawione najbardziej interesujące wydarzenia ze świata kina. Pojawiają się wywiady z osobami związanymi z branżą filmową, prowadzone są rozmowy na temat premier, nowości muzycznych i teatralnych.

programme.title: "Zasada przyjemności" - making of
programme.desc: Początek XVI wieku. Genialny malarz, rzeźbiarz, matematyk i wynalazca, Leonardo da Vinci (Aidan Turner), jest oskarżony o zamordowanie swojej muzy (Matilda De Angelis). Podczas przesłuchania snuje opowieść, która ujawnia historie stojące za jego kolejnymi wybitnymi dziełami.

programme.title: Miasta rytm: Zrabowane dzieła sztuki
programme.desc: W trakcie II wojny światowej z Polski zniknęły setki tysięcy bezcennych dzieł sztuki. Zarówno niemieccy, jak i radzieccy okupanci masowo wywozili obrazy i rzeźby. Nie wszystkie udało się odzyskać. Obecnie wiele z tych polskich zbiorów rozsianych jest po całym świecie. Historyk sztuki Jerzy S. Majewski przybliża losy tych zrabowanych dóbr. Snuje opowieść o skradzionym dorobku wielu wspaniałych artystów i wyjaśnia, co się z nim dokładnie stało.

programme.title: Volcano
Wulkan
Volcano
programme.desc: Volcano: Directed by Mick Jackson. With Tommy Lee Jones, Anne Heche, Gaby Hoffmann, Don Cheadle. A volcano erupts in downtown Los Angeles and a city official and a seismologist try to stop its inevitable flow through the city." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0120461/","name":"Volcano","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2I2MTFiOWMtY2YzOC00MTZjLTg0NWUtMmZjZWJlZDYwZDZkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A volcano erupts in downtown Los Angeles and a city official and a seismologist try to stop its inevitable flow through the city.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0120461/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Joolz"},"dateCreated":"1999-12-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"complete and utter nonsense","reviewBody":"This film really is one of the most awful pieces of rubbish I have ever had the misfortune to sit through. The storyline itself is weak, the all-American back-slapping nonsense throughout left me feeling drained. Why? I laughed out loud at some of the ridiculous almost farcial plot situations...a volcano in LA?...hmmm. programme.title: Kochankowie roku tygrysa
Kochankowie roku tygrysa
programme.desc:
Kochankowie roku tygrysa: Directed by Jacek Bromski. With Michal Zebrowski, Li Min, Sun Ji Feng, Wu Fen Xia. The year is 1913. Two Poles escape exile and cross the Siberian taiga to China. Crossing the Amur River ends tragically for one of them. The surviving man, unconscious, is found by an old Chinese hunter who takes him to his mountain shack. The hunter has a beautiful, sixteen year old daughter. Not to tempt fortune, the parents make the girl cut her hair and dress like a boy. But is it enough to prevent feelings from arising between the two?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0484051/","name":"Kochankowie roku tygrysa","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY3M2Q2MjEtMTk2Ny00OWIyLThjZDMtZjUyZWY0ZjQwNjkxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The year is 1913. Two Poles escape exile and cross the Siberian taiga to China. Crossing the Amur River ends tragically for one of them. The surviving man, unconscious, is found by an old Chinese hunter who takes him to his mountain ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0484051/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"willd-6"},"dateCreated":"2006-12-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Unrefined yet poignant...","reviewBody":"I really didn't have a good idea what this film was about before I viewed it. A Polish-directed/written film set in China with basically an entirely Chinese cast? A bit foreign for me (being from the US), to say the least.

Starting out with the main character Wolski escaping from Russian Siberia into China, you watch as he is taken in by a poor Chinese family consisting of Guo, his wife, and their daughter Song. So far, so good.

However, one night Song gets up from the dinner table and takes some food to Wolski. As soon as she sits down on his bed Guo comes in and knocks the food right out of her hand. From this moment on, Song is never the same, and you will see why.

My main complaint of this movie is that it is slow and lacks focus/direction in the early (after the first 9min) to middle parts. It is a bit slow but luckily it picks up in the last third.

One thing this movie does well is subtlety. Maybe this is a trait of foreign films in general? I am not sure because I haven't seen enough. My recommendation is if you're a fan of or interested in foreign films and enjoy short but sincere romances, then give this film a shot.

Otherwise, it might not be for you. I think I got something out of it, and for an otherwise stoic personality like myself, it definitely touched me.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":120,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.2},"genre":["Adventure","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2006-09-01","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0954076/","name":"Michal Zebrowski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1546399/","name":"Li Min"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2066134/","name":"Sun Ji Feng"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0111369/","name":"Jacek Bromski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0080717/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093398/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0111369/","name":"Jacek Bromski"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

The year is 1913. Two Poles escape exile and cross the Siberian taiga to China. Crossing the Amur River ends tragically for one of them. The surviving man, unconscious, is found by an old Chinese hunter who takes him to his mountain shack. The hunter has a beautiful, sixteen year old daughter. Not to tempt fortune, the parents make the girl cut her hair and dress like a boy. But is it enough to prevent feelings from arising between the two?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0484051/","name":"Kochankowie roku tygrysa","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY3M2Q2MjEtMTk2Ny00OWIyLThjZDMtZjUyZWY0ZjQwNjkxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The year is 1913. The surviving man, unconscious, is found by an old Chinese hunter who takes him to his mountain ","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0484051/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"willd-6","dateCreated":"2006-12-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Unrefined yet poignant...","reviewBody":"I really didn't have a good idea what this film was about before I viewed it. A Polish-directed/written film set in China with basically an entirely Chinese cast? A bit foreign for me (being from the US), to say the least.

Starting out with the main character Wolski escaping from Russian Siberia into China, you watch as he is taken in by a poor Chinese family consisting of Guo, his wife, and their daughter Song. So far, so good.

However, one night Song gets up from the dinner table and takes some food to Wolski. As soon as she sits down on his bed Guo comes in and knocks the food right out of her hand. From this moment on, Song is never the same, and you will see why.

My main complaint of this movie is that it is slow and lacks focus/direction in the early (after the first 9min) to middle parts. It is a bit slow but luckily it picks up in the last third.

One thing this movie does well is subtlety. Maybe this is a trait of foreign films in general? I am not sure because I haven't seen enough. My recommendation is if you're a fan of or interested in foreign films and enjoy short but sincere romances, then give this film a shot.

Otherwise, it might not be for you. I think I got something out of it, and for an otherwise stoic personality like myself, it definitely touched me.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":120,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.2,"genre":["Adventure","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2006-09-01","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0954076/","name":"Michal Zebrowski","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1546399/","name":"Li Min","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2066134/","name":"Sun Ji Feng"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0111369/","name":"Jacek Bromski"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0080717/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093398/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0111369/","name":"Jacek Bromski"],"duration":"PT1H40M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Król: Prolog
programme.desc: O ośmioodcinkowym serialu "Król" porozmawiają jego twórcy - reżyser Jan P. Matuszyński, aktor Michał Żurawski oraz autor powieści będącej podstawą scenariusza, Szczepan Twardoch. Widzowie dowiedzą się m.in. kto jeszcze był brany pod uwagę do zagrania głównej roli i co było inspiracją dla pisarza przy tworzeniu książki. Twardoch opowie także o swoich wrażeniach z planu serialu, a reżyser zdradzi, jakie było największe wyzwanie podczas kręcenia zdjęć.

programme.title: Hollywood Buzz
programme.desc: W programie nowości kinowe, relacje z planów zdjęciowych oraz ciekawostki związanych z gwiazdami srebrnego ekranu. O pracy nad najnowszymi hollywoodzkimi produkcjami opowiadają ich twórcy - znani reżyserzy i aktorzy. Autorzy magazynu przedstawiają również zwiastuny filmów wchodzących na ekrany kin.

programme.title: 60 kilo niczego
programme.desc: Krzysztof Kowalik (Grzegorz Damięcki) zaczyna nowy dzień pracy na stanowisku kierownika kopalni kruszców. Żeby zyskać posłuch, zamierza sprawować bezwzględne rządy. Kiedy dochodzi do nieszczęśliwego wypadku, jego moralność zostaje wystawiona na próbę.

programme.title: Listy do więzienia
The Letter Room
programme.desc: Dobroduszny, ale samotny Richard (Oscar Isaac) zostaje dyrektorem więzienia. Teraz musi przeglądać całą korespondencję osadzonych. Czytając ich listy, zaczyna bliżej poznawać prywatne sprawy podopiecznych. Interesuje się zwłaszcza skazańcem znajdującym się w celi śmierci. Postanawia podjąć działania, które wydają mu się słuszne.

programme.title: 365 obiadów Mariety Mareckiej 3
programme.desc: Gospodyni programu podpowiada, skąd czerpać inspiracje na codzienne obiady. W każdym odcinku prowadząca zaprezentuje trzy nowe potrawy, które złożą się w gotowy plan na obiad dla całej rodziny.

programme.title: News+
programme.desc: Podsumowanie najważniejszych wydarzeń z aren sportowych. Omówienie sukcesów, rekordów i porażek. Program prowadzą zamiennie m.in. Piotr Karpiński, Piotr Salak, Wojciech Zawioła i Gabriel Rogaczewski.

programme.title: Łapu-capu
programme.desc: Najśmieszniejsze fragmenty z programów polskich stacji telewizyjnych: gafy popełniane przez prezenterów, ich nietypowe zachowania przed kamerą oraz awarie techniczne powodujące absurdalne sytuacje.

programme.title: Odio l'estate
Jak ja nienawidzę wakacji!
Odio l'estate
programme.desc: Odio l'estate: Directed by Massimo Venier. With Aldo Baglio, Giovanni Storti, Giacomo Poretti, Lucia Mascino. Three families end up in the same rented house. Throughout the summer, they become friends and rediscover how to enjoy life." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10492998/","name":"Odio l'estate","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2Q5ZDdmZWItMmNiYi00MjU5LThmOTAtZDU5N2ZhYmM1NDAzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTY5OTQzNzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three families end up in the same rented house. Throughout the summer, they become friends and rediscover how to enjoy life.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10492998/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"antoniotierno"},"dateCreated":"2020-02-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"excellent return","reviewBody":"A few years after the not so succesfull experiment of "Fuga da Reuma Park", after the celebrations for 25 years of activity together and after Aldo Baglio had started working alone (that seemed to be the beginning of the end of the Trio), here they go with a surprise new film, bringing the three guys back in the wake of a solid and mature comedy, which gets to speak to the hearts of old fans but maybe also able to conquer new ones. Certainly a bittersweet reflection on the passing of time and the risk of forgetting who we are, the story well written, funny and at times even moving, The film features three unexpectedly excellent first ladies, perfectly at ease in their meeting with Aldo Giovanni and Giacomo as well as the return of their historic director, who still knows how to make the most of their potential.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2229,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2020-01-30","keywords":"friend","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer [OVS]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3128737305","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTA5Y2E2MWUtMTdkYS00NjI3LTg0NzQtNTZmZmQwMjA0MDc3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTA5Y2E2MWUtMTdkYS00NjI3LTg0NzQtNTZmZmQwMjA0MDc3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0017623/","name":"Aldo Baglio"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0320495/","name":"Giovanni Storti"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0316034/","name":"Giacomo Poretti"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0893111/","name":"Massimo Venier"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043281/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0117688/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0254125/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3291357/","name":"Davide Lantieri"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1614496/","name":"Michele Pellegrini"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0893111/","name":"Massimo Venier"}],"duration":"PT1H50M"}</script><metacontent="

Certainly a bittersweet reflection on the passing of time and the risk of forgetting who we are, the story well written, funny and at times even moving, The film features three unexpectedly excellent first ladies, perfectly at ease in their meeting with Aldo Giovanni and Giacomo as well as the return of their historic director, who still knows how to make the most of their potential.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2229,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6,"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2020-01-30","keywords":"friend","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer [OVS]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3128737305","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTA5Y2E2MWUtMTdkYS00NjI3LTg0NzQtNTZmZmQwMjA0MDc3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTA5Y2E2MWUtMTdkYS00NjI3LTg0NzQtNTZmZmQwMjA0MDc3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0017623/","name":"Aldo Baglio","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0320495/","name":"Giovanni Storti","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0316034/","name":"Giacomo Poretti"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0893111/","name":"Massimo Venier"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043281/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0117688/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0254125/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3291357/","name":"Davide Lantieri","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1614496/","name":"Michele Pellegrini","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0893111/","name":"Massimo Venier"],"duration":"PT1H50M"</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: There's Something About Mary: Directed by Bobby Farrelly, Peter Farrelly. With Cameron Diaz, Matt Dillon, Ben Stiller, Lee Evans. A man gets a chance to meet up with his dream girl from high school, even though his date with her back then was a complete disaster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0129387/","name":"There's Something About Mary","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWFlZjE5OTYtNWY0ZC00MzgzLTg5MjUtYTFkZjk2NjJkYjM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTAyODkwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A man gets a chance to meet up with his dream girl from high school, even though his date with her back then was a complete disaster.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0129387/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Meredith-7"},"dateCreated":"1999-11-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Goofy, low brow humour- but it has something...","reviewBody":"In the past I have not been a great fan of the Farrelly brothers films, however this film is an exception. The dog scenes were probably the funniest personally, but there were heaps of other scenes that are well worth a mention. Cameron Diaz was fantastic as Mary, the girl everyone is after and Ben Stiller was excellent. Matt Dillon was way too over the top- I know his role somewhat warranted it- but did he have to be so excessive? He seemed so irritating. There is no doubt that the humour in this film is of the lowest possible calibre, but it really works- think Dumb & Dumber, but only quite good. Despite all the comic situations in the film, there is still something undeniably sweet in the centre of the story, I think thats what made it work. Its certainly not top class entertainment, but its highly recommended for when you are in a stupid mood and need a good laugh.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":300424,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"1998-07-15","keywords":"love triangle,original story,black man white woman marriage,penis caught in zipper,ejaculation","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":""13 Reasons Why" Stars Break Down Their Worst Auditions","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2956574233","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDcyNTEwMmMtYTUxOS00NDIxLTk1YmMtNWU2MTU4ZjczZGYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDcyNTEwMmMtYTUxOS00NDIxLTk1YmMtNWU2MTU4ZjczZGYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","description":""13 Reasons Why" stars Ross Butler and Brandon Flynn show off their animated voice-over acting chops and reveal their most embarrassing auditions."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000139/","name":"Cameron Diaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000369/","name":"Matt Dillon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001774/","name":"Ben Stiller"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0125803/","name":"Bobby Farrelly"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0268380/","name":"Peter Farrelly"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0214036/","name":"Ed Decter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0833828/","name":"John J. programme.title: Tenis: Turniej WTA w Ostrawie - mecz finałowy gry pojedynczej
programme.desc: Jakub Szczęsny pokaże miejsca będące dowodem na to, jak Polska zmienia się pod względem architektury. Na liście znajdą się Filharmonia im. M. Karłowicza w Szczecinie i Teatr Szekspirowski w Gdańsku.

programme.title: Kupione i co dalej? 3
programme.desc: Projektantka Marta Czerkies urządza kolejne mieszkania i domy w stanie deweloperskim. Przeprowadza właścicieli nieruchomości przez cały proces - od projektu do efektu końcowego. Pomaga dostosować wizję wymarzonego wnętrza do możliwości finansowych. W programie znajdzie się też wiele praktycznych porad, inspiracji i remontowych trików.

programme.title: Spy
Agentka
Spy
programme.desc:
Spy: Directed by Paul Feig. With Jude Law, Raad Rawi, Melissa McCarthy, Jessica Chaffin. A desk-bound CIA analyst volunteers to go undercover to infiltrate the world of a deadly arms dealer, and prevent diabolical global disaster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3079380/","name":"Spy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjI5OTQ0MDQxM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzcwNjMyNTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A desk-bound CIA analyst volunteers to go undercover to infiltrate the world of a deadly arms dealer, and prevent diabolical global disaster.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3079380/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"lnvicta"},"dateCreated":"2015-06-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"James Bond, Jane Bond, and Jason Statham - a lethal combo for laughter","reviewBody":"Kingsman: The Secret Service started a beautiful new wave of James Bond satire films. It's been done before but never quite as meta as it was in Kingsman, actively referencing how similar the plot and archetypes are to James Bond while still having a refreshing novelty factor and interesting characters of its own - creating this whole new world for the over-the-top James Bond-esque adventures to take place while the real James Bond canon continues its serious, grounded story arc. 

While Kingsman was about setting up this elite organization and showing off their penchant for ridiculously elaborate action sequences, Spy has little exposition and throws you right into this hysterical world where Jude Law is the super suave secret agent and Melissa McCarthy acts as his eyes and ears back at headquarters. Jason Statham comes in later as a rogue agent who is as arrogant as he is oblivious. The movie doesn't itself seriously but it never goes into parody territory. These characters, as overblown and ridiculous as they are, still have relatable personalities, and you're willing to go on this crazy adventure with them right from the start. 

Spy is very much an action comedy - whether you view it more as an action movie or as a comedy is completely up to you. I found it hilarious within the first minute and was laughing heartily throughout the entire movie, but there's no denying that the action sequences are incredibly well done. Specifically, the fight between Susan Cooper (McCarthy) and a female assassin in a kitchen, the opening sequence of Cooper alerting Bradley Fine (Law) where enemies are while Fine sweeps them up in a rat maze full of baddies, and the scene with the car where Cooper mops the floor with a handful of terrorists with little to no effort. If you aren't laughing at the jokes, you can laugh at how insane and over-the-top the action is - either way, it's an incredibly fun time.

What I find most compelling about Spy is how likable each character is. It's not just McCarthy, Law, and Statham with a bunch of stoic supporting characters. No, even the supporting characters are hilarious and interesting. Miranda Hart plays Cooper's goofy friend who does dumb things with the best of intentions, Rose Byrne plays the villainous daughter of a rich terrorist and has some excellent back-and-forth bickering with McCarthy, and Peter Serafinowicz plays Aldo: a sleazy Frenchman who absolutely loves women and especially their boobs. They all have moments of hilarity; even the main antagonist played by Bobby Cannavale who is supposed to be a classy businessman has quirky one-liners and the funniest villain run I've seen in recent memory. Oh, and 50 Cent is in it playing 50 Cent. Yeah, it's as crazy as it sounds.

As far as lead performances go, this is the funniest Melissa McCarthy has ever been. This is the ideal role for her because her character has a serious job and a serious mission juxtaposed with McCarthy's snarky personality and usual shenanigans, making for some truly hysterical situations. Jason Statham, however, is the real highlight here. The man is brilliant in this role. He's a tough-guy agent that goes around bragging about how badass he is and goes on to do the stupidest things ever while still keeping a straight face and menacing persona - essentially a parody of his usual roles. His rants are comedy gold simply because it's Statham doing them. He proves here that he's not only one of the greatest action stars working today but also one of the funniest. The fact that he even agreed to this movie says a lot about Statham's attitude - he's a great sport and isn't afraid to make fun of himself, and I really hope this earns him more comedic roles in the future.

Spy was everything I wanted it to be and more. I laughed harder at this movie than I did at most comedies in the past decade. The production value was fantastic, the pacing was perfect, and director Paul Feig clearly knows how to do comedy but now can add action to his resume. Everything about this movie works. It also allows James Bond to continue its serious endeavors, Kingsman to handle the classy yet gritty side of secret agents, while Spy focuses on the campy and silly nature of the whole affair. I sincerely hope this gets a franchise because there are too many great things happening for it not to get a sequel. On it's own however, Spy is an absolutely brilliant, perfectly casted satire that should not be missed by fans of action, comedy, or fun.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":236869,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2015-06-05","keywords":"fellatio,prosthetic penis,vulgarity,hit in the crotch,male nudity","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi707571993","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODQ3MjkyNTIxM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODUyMTExNTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODQ3MjkyNTIxM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODUyMTExNTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A desk-bound CIA analyst volunteers to go undercover to infiltrate the world of a deadly arms dealer, and prevent diabolical global disaster."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0565250/","name":"Melissa McCarthy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0126284/","name":"Rose Byrne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000179/","name":"Jude Law"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0082450/","name":"Paul Feig"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0286257/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0409029/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0082450/","name":"Paul Feig"}],"duration":"PT2H"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Houria (Consolate Siperius) z mężem i córką zatrzymują się w domu krewnej w Europie. Czekają na informację z urzędu imigracyjnego. Gospodyni traktuje gości życzliwie. Z czasem pojawiają się problemy.

programme.title: 365 obiadów Mariety Mareckiej 3
programme.desc: Gospodyni programu podpowiada, skąd czerpać inspiracje na codzienne obiady. W każdym odcinku prowadząca zaprezentuje trzy nowe potrawy, które złożą się w gotowy plan na obiad dla całej rodziny.

Ringo Starr, Michael Angelis, George Carlin, Alec Baldwin, Michael Brandon, Ben Small, Kerry Shale, Martin Sherman, Matt Wilkinson
Rosamund Pike, Warwick Davis, Taron Egerton, Bel Powley, Matt Berry, Akiya Henry, Edvin Endre, Kate Winslet, Katie Leung

programme.title: News+
programme.desc: Podsumowanie najważniejszych wydarzeń z aren sportowych. Omówienie sukcesów, rekordów i porażek. Program prowadzą zamiennie m.in. Piotr Karpiński, Piotr Salak, Wojciech Zawioła i Gabriel Rogaczewski.

programme.title: Wysoki Pressing
programme.desc: Prowadzony w lekkiej formule telewizji śniadaniowej program poświęcony piłce nożnej. Gospodarz wraz z gośćmi omówi najważniejsze boiskowe wydarzenia, nie zabraknie też wnikliwych analiz i gorących dyskusji. Prowadzącymi na zmianę będą Daria Kabała-Malarz i Michał Kołodziejczyk.

programme.title: Turbokozak Extra
programme.desc: Bartosz Ignacik i Grzegorz Jędrzejewski sprawdzają, jak ludzie związani z szeroko pojętym światem sportu poradzą sobie na boisku. Zaproszeni goście muszą wykonać różne piłkarskie zadania. Za ich wykonanie otrzymują punkty, które zaliczane są do klasyfikacji danego sezonu programu.

programme.title: O co biega?
programme.desc: W magazynie nowinki oraz praktyczne porady dla osób, które uprawiają bieganie rekreacyjnie, półprofesjonalnie, zawodowo lub dopiero zaczynają. Gospodarz programu Marcin Rosłoń wraz z ekspertami będzie podpowiadał, jak przygotować się do biegania amatorskiego i zawodowego, jak dobrać odpowiedni sprzęt lub przygotować się do maratonu. W programie nie zabraknie również ciekawostek, rozmów ze sportowcami i osobami z show-biznesu, które opowiedzą o swojej pasji do biegania.

programme.title: THE LEGENDS z Tomkiem Ćwiąkałą
programme.desc: Cykl wywiadów przeprowadzanych przez Tomka Ćwiąkałę z ważnymi postaciami ze świata futbolu. Wśród nich są mistrzowie świata, Europy i gwiazdy topowych lig. Widzowie dowiedzą się, czym zajmują się dzisiaj, jak wspominają swoje kariery oraz poznają ich plany na przyszłość.

credits.actor: Karolina Kuszewska-Łukasik, Sasha Sidorenko, Sylwia Zaczkiewicz, Dominika Rembelska, Gabriela Kuzawińska, Ewa Piątkowska, Joanna Jędrzejczyk, Sylwia Kusiak, Magdalena Loska

programme.title: Zielona rewolucja Marty Dymek
programme.desc: Popularna blogerka Marta Dymek w każdym odcinku próbuje przekonać zaproszonego gościa do kuchni wegetariańskiej. Prowadząca pokaże, jak zastąpić potrawy mięsne ich jarskimi wariacjami.

programme.title: ABC gotowania - kuchnia włoska
programme.desc: Sztuka kulinarna we Włoszech opiera się na prostych potrawach przygotowanych z dobrych składników. Oliwa z oliwek, warzywa i zioła, sery, ryby, owoce morza, jajka, mąka i oliwki to podstawy wielu dań.

programme.title: David w Europie 5
programme.desc: Szef kuchni David Gaboriaud zabiera widzów w podróż po smakach Rumunii, Bułgarii, Serbii i Węgier. Prowadzący spróbuje regionalnych potraw i odwiedzi najciekawsze restauracje, bary oraz bistra. Oprócz tego przyrządzi dania, które będą jego interpretacją lokalnych potraw, a także sprawdzi się w charakterystycznych dla tamtych regionów aktywnościach fizycznych.

programme.title: Meblokreacje 4
programme.desc: Program udowadnia, że niewielkim kosztem i przy użyciu ogólnodostępnych materiałów można odnowić każdy stary mebel i uczynić z niego nietuzinkową ozdobę każdego wnętrza. W czwartym sezonie programu projektant wnętrz Artur Indyka pokaże m.in. jak wykorzystać stare ławy do urządzenia kawalerki, jak zaaranżować pokój we wschodnim stylu oraz jak wykonać żyrandol ze starych winyli. Podejmie się też zrobienia pomocy terapeutycznych do pracy z dziećmi i dorosłymi w świetlicy psychologicznej.

programme.title: Trick
Trik
Trick
programme.desc:
Trick: Directed by Patrick Lussier. With Jamie Kennedy, Omar Epps, Vanessa Aspillaga, Tom Atkins. A no-nonsense detective tries to track down a mass murderer named Trick, who is terrorizing a small town." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9177040/","name":"Trick","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2NhZDkwMzktNjIzNy00NTBjLWJhYzQtNDQyN2I0NzQ4NDVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTEyMDE1MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A no-nonsense detective tries to track down a mass murderer named Trick, who is terrorizing a small town.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9177040/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"carolinephillips-47427"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Acceptable Halloween Slice and Dicer","reviewBody":"Trick won't win any awards anytime soon, but it's far from the disaster many people have been making it out to be. I walked in expecting the worst, but the first 20 minutes genuinely gripped me and even made me jump once. As the film continues, it mostly becomes a Dr. Loomis vs. Michael Myers storyline with Omar Epps' frazzled detective trying to make sense of how a seemingly normal teenage male could survive a few gunshots and a fall off a hospital roof and still continue to kill people every Halloween for a number of years. Could it be a copycat killer? You'll have to stick with Trick to find out and, once you do, you'll most likely be let down.

While most of the film plays out like a supernatural-tinged slasher, the last 15 minutes of the movie, where the film finally reveals what's really been going on, is likely to inspire many groans and rolling eyes. There's a piece of an interesting idea in there, but it's not as well-executed as it could have been. There's a final twist at the end that's really a groaner and makes no sense whatsoever.

The acting is at least passable for most of the film and it's nice to see genre icon Tom Atkins getting something to do every now and then. It also might be one of the better of the recent "the corpses in this haunted house are real" movies that seem to be coming out all the time. There's some good suspense here and there, too, so Trick is far from a complete waste of time.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4554,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.9},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Horror"],"datePublished":"2019-10-18","keywords":"halloween,splatter,slasher,gore,bloody","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1954987801","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGQ0NGJlMTctNGFmYy00OWI2LTk4YTYtZjBjYmY4ZWMzNmQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGQ0NGJlMTctNGFmYy00OWI2LTk4YTYtZjBjYmY4ZWMzNmQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"On Halloween night in 2015, Patrick "Trick" Weaver massacred his classmates at a costume party. After being arrested, he managed to escape police custody, but not before being shot five times by Detective Mike Denver (Epps). Everyone believes Trick must be dead, but when a masked killer reappears the following Halloween, and every Halloween after that, they realize the nightmare is not over. With Trick wreaking havoc and killing innocent people in increasingly terrifying ways, Denver will stop at nothing to finish what he started and bring the carnage to an end."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005085/","name":"Jamie Kennedy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004898/","name":"Omar Epps"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0039665/","name":"Vanessa Aspillaga"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0527261/","name":"Patrick Lussier"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0746728/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0766776/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0040970/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0267805/","name":"Todd Farmer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0527261/","name":"Patrick Lussier"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 9177040, Title: Trick, --- Description: Trick: Directed by Patrick Lussier. With Jamie Kennedy, Omar Epps, Vanessa Aspillaga, Tom Atkins. A no-nonsense detective tries to track down a mass murderer named Trick, who is terrorizing a small town." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9177040/","name":"Trick","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2NhZDkwMzktNjIzNy00NTBjLWJhYzQtNDQyN2I0NzQ4NDVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTEyMDE1MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A no-nonsense detective tries to track down a mass murderer named Trick, who is terrorizing a small town.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9177040/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"carolinephillips-47427","dateCreated":"2020-01-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Acceptable Halloween Slice and Dicer","reviewBody":"Trick won't win any awards anytime soon, but it's far from the disaster many people have been making it out to be. I walked in expecting the worst, but the first 20 minutes genuinely gripped me and even made me jump once. As the film continues, it mostly becomes a Dr. Loomis vs. Michael Myers storyline with Omar Epps' frazzled detective trying to make sense of how a seemingly normal teenage male could survive a few gunshots and a fall off a hospital roof and still continue to kill people every Halloween for a number of years. Could it be a copycat killer? You'll have to stick with Trick to find out and, once you do, you'll most likely be let down.

While most of the film plays out like a supernatural-tinged slasher, the last 15 minutes of the movie, where the film finally reveals what's really been going on, is likely to inspire many groans and rolling eyes. There's a piece of an interesting idea in there, but it's not as well-executed as it could have been. There's a final twist at the end that's really a groaner and makes no sense whatsoever.

The acting is at least passable for most of the film and it's nice to see genre icon Tom Atkins getting something to do every now and then. It also might be one of the better of the recent "the corpses in this haunted house are real" movies that seem to be coming out all the time. There's some good suspense here and there, too, so Trick is far from a complete waste of time.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4554,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.9,"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Horror"],"datePublished":"2019-10-18","keywords":"halloween,splatter,slasher,gore,bloody","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1954987801","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGQ0NGJlMTctNGFmYy00OWI2LTk4YTYtZjBjYmY4ZWMzNmQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGQ0NGJlMTctNGFmYy00OWI2LTk4YTYtZjBjYmY4ZWMzNmQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"On Halloween night in 2015, Patrick "Trick" Weaver massacred his classmates at a costume party. After being arrested, he managed to escape police custody, but not before being shot five times by Detective Mike Denver (Epps). Everyone believes Trick must be dead, but when a masked killer reappears the following Halloween, and every Halloween after that, they realize the nightmare is not over. With Trick wreaking havoc and killing innocent people in increasingly terrifying ways, Denver will stop at nothing to finish what he started and bring the carnage to an end.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005085/","name":"Jamie Kennedy","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004898/","name":"Omar Epps","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0039665/","name":"Vanessa Aspillaga"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0527261/","name":"Patrick Lussier"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0746728/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0766776/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0040970/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0267805/","name":"Todd Farmer","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0527261/","name":"Patrick Lussier"],"duration":"PT1H40M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Kill Team
The Kill Team
programme.desc: The Kill Team: Directed by Dan Krauss. With Nat Wolff, Alexander Skarsgård, Adam Long, Jonathan Whitesell. A young American soldier in Afghanistan is disturbed by his commanding officer's behavior and is faced with a moral dilemma." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6196936/","name":"The Kill Team","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTgxNmY2MDAtM2QzYS00MmNmLTk2NWYtNDA1NzRiOGM4MzQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young American soldier in Afghanistan is disturbed by his commanding officer's behavior and is faced with a moral dilemma.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6196936/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"brianthomas-35660"},"dateCreated":"2019-10-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Could've, should've been better","reviewBody":"I don't want to give any spoilers so I'll just say this movie had the right story, the right actors, the right setting to be something special but the whole film came out shallow & flat imo. It just seemed like a paint by numbers production. The battle or military sequences could've been more broad or involved. They could've included the trials & news coverage or the impact this story had on the country or military but didn't.\n\nWhen the movie ended & went to credits I said to myself: 'is that it?' Evidently it was & it just wasn't good enough imo.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4291,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Biography","Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-10-25","keywords":"based on true story","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3276061721","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDQxNjE5ZjctZGZlZS00ZGJiLWFiZTUtNDY1MjNkMDVmNTMyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDQxNjE5ZjctZGZlZS00ZGJiLWFiZTUtNDY1MjNkMDVmNTMyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"When Andrew Briggman (Nat Wolff), a young soldier in the US invasion of Afghanistan, witnesses other recruits killing innocent civilians under the direction of a sadistic leader, Sergeant Deeks (Alexander Skarsgård), he considers reporting them to higher-ups -- but the heavily-armed, increasingly violent platoon becomes suspicious that someone in their ranks has turned on them, and Andrew begins to fear that he'll be the next target."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1822659/","name":"Nat Wolff"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002907/","name":"Alexander Skarsgård"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3072420/","name":"Adam Long"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1830532/","name":"Dan Krauss"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0001526/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0351221/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0069651/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1830532/","name":"Dan Krauss"}],"duration":"PT1H27M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Longest Ride
Najdłuższa podróż
The Longest Ride
programme.desc: The Longest Ride: Directed by George Tillman Jr.. With Britt Robertson, Scott Eastwood, Alan Alda, Jack Huston. The lives of a young couple intertwine with a much older man, as he reflects back on a past love." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2726560/","name":"The Longest Ride","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzIzMjg0NjQwNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODAwOTE4MzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of a young couple intertwine with a much older man, as he reflects back on a past love.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2726560/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"patsworld"},"dateCreated":"2015-05-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"So, There's Yet Another Eastwood Heartthrob!","reviewBody":"And I don't think it's going to take any time at all for this hunk to be completely and absolutely known only for his own looks, talent, and fame rather than having the fact that he's Clint Eastwood's son being tacked on. Scott is good! Britt Robertson was nicely cast as Sophia, except I have to admit here that I kept seeing a young Renee Zellweger in the part– before the silly plastic surgery turned her into a total stranger. Or just strange. Whatever. Jack Huston was excellent as a young Ira and I think portraying the elderly Ira is one of Alan Alda's best roles. I was just expecting the usual chick flick - but not so. Rugged enough action with the bull riding to interest any guy, as well as a decent plot and all around good acting. To sum it up, this is a nicely done film and one I wouldn't hesitate to recommend.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":79481,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2015-04-15","keywords":"usa,united states,college student,college,bull riding","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #3","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2592911641","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg2NTkwODY1MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzUwOTQ4NDE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg2NTkwODY1MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzUwOTQ4NDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of a young couple intertwine with a much older man as he reflects back on a lost love while he's trapped in an automobile crash."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2207222/","name":"Scott Eastwood"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1429380/","name":"Britt Robertson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000257/","name":"Alan Alda"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0863387/","name":"George Tillman Jr."}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017497/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0081189/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0069651/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0817023/","name":"Nicholas Sparks"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0093271/","name":"Craig Bolotin"}],"duration":"PT2H3M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 2726560, Title: The Longest Ride, --- Description: The Longest Ride: Directed by George Tillman Jr.. With Britt Robertson, Scott Eastwood, Alan Alda, Jack Huston. The lives of a young couple intertwine with a much older man, as he reflects back on a past love." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2726560/","name":"The Longest Ride","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzIzMjg0NjQwNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODAwOTE4MzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of a young couple intertwine with a much older man, as he reflects back on a past love.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2726560/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"patsworld","dateCreated":"2015-05-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"So, There's Yet Another Eastwood Heartthrob!","reviewBody":"And I don't think it's going to take any time at all for this hunk to be completely and absolutely known only for his own looks, talent, and fame rather than having the fact that he's Clint Eastwood's son being tacked on. Scott is good! Britt Robertson was nicely cast as Sophia, except I have to admit here that I kept seeing a young Renee Zellweger in the part– before the silly plastic surgery turned her into a total stranger. Or just strange. Whatever. Jack Huston was excellent as a young Ira and I think portraying the elderly Ira is one of Alan Alda's best roles. I was just expecting the usual chick flick - but not so. Rugged enough action with the bull riding to interest any guy, as well as a decent plot and all around good acting. To sum it up, this is a nicely done film and one I wouldn't hesitate to recommend.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":79481,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2015-04-15","keywords":"usa,united states,college student,college,bull riding","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #3","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2592911641","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg2NTkwODY1MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzUwOTQ4NDE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg2NTkwODY1MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzUwOTQ4NDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of a young couple intertwine with a much older man as he reflects back on a lost love while he's trapped in an automobile crash.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2207222/","name":"Scott Eastwood","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1429380/","name":"Britt Robertson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000257/","name":"Alan Alda"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0863387/","name":"George Tillman Jr."],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017497/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0081189/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0069651/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0817023/","name":"Nicholas Sparks","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0093271/","name":"Craig Bolotin"],"duration":"PT2H3M"</script><metacontent="

Echo Boomers
programme.desc: Echo Boomers: Directed by Seth Savoy. With Michael Shannon, Patrick Schwarzenegger, Alex Pettyfer, Hayley Law. Based on a true story, five college graduates decide the best way to get back at the unfair economy and live the life they've always wanted is to steal from Chicago's richest and give to themselves." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4353270/","name":"Echo Boomers","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGRiYzEyMmMtMjgwNy00MzE0LWE4M2UtZDFlMzQ0MWVjNWNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzQwMTY2Nzk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Based on a true story, five college graduates decide the best way to get back at the unfair economy and live the life they've always wanted is to steal from Chicago's richest and give to themselves.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4353270/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"khasding-63293"},"dateCreated":"2020-11-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Cant get past the sniveling","reviewBody":"I tried, but all I hear is wah wah wah. the one percenters have everything and because my schooling wasn't free and I didn't get a guaranteed job I deserve to go steal things. the absurdity of this was almost too much to bear so I couldn't finish watching the movie otherwise it was mildly entertaining. Also the fact that magazine reporter was seem to be hanging on his every word was a very much of a buzzkill these little creeps are what prisons were made for entitled little baby boomers","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7859,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-11-13","keywords":"college","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi949666073","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDIxYjdiMDEtY2ZlYy00ZjFjLTljZDctN2JhMDJiMmZhNjE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDIxYjdiMDEtY2ZlYy00ZjFjLTljZDctN2JhMDJiMmZhNjE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two-time Academy Award® nominee Michael Shannon (Knives Out) stars in this gripping crime-thriller filled with pulse-pounding twists and turns. When he is pulled into a criminal underground operation, he finds his peers fighting the system by stealing from the rich and giving to... themselves. programme.title: Berlin, I Love You
Zakochany Berlin
Berlin, I Love You
programme.desc: Berlin, I Love You: Directed by Dianna Agron, Peter Chelsom, Claus Clausen, Fernando Eimbcke, Justin Franklin, Dennis Gansel, Dani Levy, Daniel Lwowski, Stephanie Martin, Josef Rusnak, Til Schweiger, Massy Tadjedin, Gabriela Tscherniak. With Keira Knightley, Helen Mirren, Luke Wilson, Jim Sturgess. Latest installment of the Cities of Love series (Paris, je t'aime / New York, I Love You / Rio, Eu Te Amo), this collective feature film is made of ten stories of romance set in the German capital." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2275743/","name":"Berlin, I Love You","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDIwMTNlZmYtZGIxZS00MzAyLWI5MWMtYzg3YWNiNzg5YTI5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzQwMTY2Nzk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Latest installment of the Cities of Love series (Paris, je t'aime / New York, I Love You / Rio, Eu Te Amo), this collective feature film is made of ten stories of romance set in the German capital.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2275743/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Gordon-11"},"dateCreated":"2019-04-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's horrid","reviewBody":"This film is a collage of segments of people whose lives intersect in Berlin.\n\nWith this many big names, it is a surprise that the film is allowed to be a horrid mess. Just the first segment alone is enough to make me lose interest in the whole film. It is a bizarre short about a man and a GPS system, and it is just way too strange to be likable. The subsequent segments get no better, not even the one with Helen Mirren and Keira Knightley. The Berlin protrayed in the film is an unattractive dump, and it does not inspire any romantic feelings. Fortunately, there is one segment that is good, which is the puppet show one. It gives warmth and radiates attraction, which is the only segment that sticks to romantic love in Berlin."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2919,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2019-08-08","keywords":"portmanteau film,directed by several directors,punctuation in title,city name in title,female nudity","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Berlin, I Love You","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3909401113","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDU1NTgxM2MtZDAzYi00ZDVkLTk5MjItMGM5NzAwZmRmOGNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDU1NTgxM2MtZDAzYi00ZDVkLTk5MjItMGM5NzAwZmRmOGNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0461136/","name":"Keira Knightley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000545/","name":"Helen Mirren"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005561/","name":"Luke Wilson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1872698/","name":"Dianna Agron"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0155093/","name":"Peter Chelsom"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1313447/","name":"Claus Clausen"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0671138/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0174940/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0228761/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0251774/","name":"Fernando Eimbcke"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3418586/","name":"Justin Franklin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0304541/","name":"Dennis Gansel"}],"duration":"PT2H"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Moby Doc
Moby Doc
programme.desc: Moby Doc: Directed by Rob Gordon Bralver. With Moby, David Lynch, Julie Mintz, Gary Baseman. A surrealist biographical documentary about trailblazing electronic musician and animal rights activist Moby." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5452210/","name":"Moby Doc","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzViMmFlMjItODgxMy00NTg2LWIyZjAtODQwM2VjNmI5MmIxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTM5NzYzNTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"A surrealist biographical documentary about trailblazing electronic musician and animal rights activist Moby.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5452210/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"hallamdrury-88-738756"},"dateCreated":"2021-07-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Somehow makes trauma feel like vanity","reviewBody":"As a big Moby fan back in the day I was really excited to see it. But what a bizarre documentary. Very contrived interview set up with fake conversations with fake psychiatrists and with people on the phone. Stylistically it jumps around and is very inconsistent. The story leaps around and doesn't link together and huge periods of his life are just left out. There's very odd b-roll choices and over-use of space and rockets. The humour feels awkward and makes the deeper stuff seem like it wasn't to be taken serious.\n\nBut the most disappointing thing was how insincere it comes across. For a story with so much trauma, sadness, suicide etc it comes across more as vanity than vulnerability. I appreciate bold creative choices, but boy did they make the wrong ones here. It just completely undermined the themes of the film. It's a mess that makes Moby less relatable. This is exactly how NOT to make a documentary about this subject matter.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":277,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"genre":["Documentary","Biography","Music"],"datePublished":"2021-05-28","keywords":"musician,fame,animal,vegan,grim reaper","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Moby Doc","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3750084633","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjY3NTAxZjUtNjljZi00N2YzLTljZjUtMTExOGZiNDhlZjVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjY3NTAxZjUtNjljZi00N2YzLTljZjUtMTExOGZiNDhlZjVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005240/","name":"Moby"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000186/","name":"David Lynch"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0591777/","name":"Julie Mintz"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3964003/","name":"Rob Gordon Bralver"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0744176/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3964003/","name":"Rob Gordon Bralver"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005240/","name":"Moby"}],"duration":"PT1H32M"}</script><metacontent="

A surrealist biographical documentary about trailblazing electronic musician and animal rights activist Moby." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5452210/","name":"Moby Doc","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzViMmFlMjItODgxMy00NTg2LWIyZjAtODQwM2VjNmI5MmIxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTM5NzYzNTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"A surrealist biographical documentary about trailblazing electronic musician and animal rights activist Moby.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5452210/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"hallamdrury-88-738756","dateCreated":"2021-07-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Somehow makes trauma feel like vanity","reviewBody":"As a big Moby fan back in the day I was really excited to see it. But what a bizarre documentary. Very contrived interview set up with fake conversations with fake psychiatrists and with people on the phone. Stylistically it jumps around and is very inconsistent. The story leaps around and doesn't link together and huge periods of his life are just left out. There's very odd b-roll choices and over-use of space and rockets. The humour feels awkward and makes the deeper stuff seem like it wasn't to be taken serious.\n\nBut the most disappointing thing was how insincere it comes across. For a story with so much trauma, sadness, suicide etc it comes across more as vanity than vulnerability. I appreciate bold creative choices, but boy did they make the wrong ones here. It just completely undermined the themes of the film. It's a mess that makes Moby less relatable. This is exactly how NOT to make a documentary about this subject matter.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":277,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"genre":["Documentary","Biography","Music"],"datePublished":"2021-05-28","keywords":"musician,fame,animal,vegan,grim reaper","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Moby Doc","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3750084633","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjY3NTAxZjUtNjljZi00N2YzLTljZjUtMTExOGZiNDhlZjVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjY3NTAxZjUtNjljZi00N2YzLTljZjUtMTExOGZiNDhlZjVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005240/","name":"Moby","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000186/","name":"David Lynch","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0591777/","name":"Julie Mintz"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3964003/","name":"Rob Gordon Bralver"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0744176/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3964003/","name":"Rob Gordon Bralver","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005240/","name":"Moby"],"duration":"PT1H32M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: O co biega?
programme.desc: W magazynie nowinki oraz praktyczne porady dla osób, które uprawiają bieganie rekreacyjnie, półprofesjonalnie, zawodowo lub dopiero zaczynają. Gospodarz programu Marcin Rosłoń wraz z ekspertami będzie podpowiadał, jak przygotować się do biegania amatorskiego i zawodowego, jak dobrać odpowiedni sprzęt lub przygotować się do maratonu. W programie nie zabraknie również ciekawostek, rozmów ze sportowcami i osobami z show-biznesu, które opowiedzą o swojej pasji do biegania.

credits.actor: Aleksandra Konieczna, Mateusz Więcławek, Józefina Siwko, Robert Czebotar, Krzysztof Szmyt, Andrzej Kozłowski

There's Something About Mary
programme.desc: There's Something About Mary: Directed by Bobby Farrelly, Peter Farrelly. With Cameron Diaz, Matt Dillon, Ben Stiller, Lee Evans. A man gets a chance to meet up with his dream girl from high school, even though his date with her back then was a complete disaster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0129387/","name":"There's Something About Mary","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWFlZjE5OTYtNWY0ZC00MzgzLTg5MjUtYTFkZjk2NjJkYjM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTAyODkwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A man gets a chance to meet up with his dream girl from high school, even though his date with her back then was a complete disaster.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0129387/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Meredith-7"},"dateCreated":"1999-11-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Goofy, low brow humour- but it has something...","reviewBody":"In the past I have not been a great fan of the Farrelly brothers films, however this film is an exception. The dog scenes were probably the funniest personally, but there were heaps of other scenes that are well worth a mention. Cameron Diaz was fantastic as Mary, the girl everyone is after and Ben Stiller was excellent. Matt Dillon was way too over the top- I know his role somewhat warranted it- but did he have to be so excessive? He seemed so irritating. There is no doubt that the humour in this film is of the lowest possible calibre, but it really works- think Dumb & Dumber, but only quite good. Despite all the comic situations in the film, there is still something undeniably sweet in the centre of the story, I think thats what made it work. Its certainly not top class entertainment, but its highly recommended for when you are in a stupid mood and need a good laugh.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":300424,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"1998-07-15","keywords":"love triangle,original story,black man white woman marriage,penis caught in zipper,ejaculation","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":""13 Reasons Why" Stars Break Down Their Worst Auditions","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2956574233","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDcyNTEwMmMtYTUxOS00NDIxLTk1YmMtNWU2MTU4ZjczZGYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDcyNTEwMmMtYTUxOS00NDIxLTk1YmMtNWU2MTU4ZjczZGYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","description":""13 Reasons Why" stars Ross Butler and Brandon Flynn show off their animated voice-over acting chops and reveal their most embarrassing auditions."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000139/","name":"Cameron Diaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000369/","name":"Matt Dillon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001774/","name":"Ben Stiller"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0125803/","name":"Bobby Farrelly"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0268380/","name":"Peter Farrelly"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0214036/","name":"Ed Decter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0833828/","name":"John J.
