A Divisão
programme.desc: A Divisão: Directed by Vicente Amorim. With Erom Cordeiro, Thelmo Fernandes, Vanessa Gerbelli, Bruce Gomlevsky. In the 90s, Rio de Janeiro was shaken by a wave of kidnappings. Security forces call controversial agents to help save the city from thugs and also from the police itself." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10648192/","name":"A Divisão","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzE0OGYwYTMtMDAwYy00OWIyLThmZjUtOWEyODU2OWQxNWJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkzODUwNzk@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the 90s, Rio de Janeiro was shaken by a wave of kidnappings. Security forces call controversial agents to help save the city from thugs and also from the police itself.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10648192/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kosmasp"},"dateCreated":"2021-01-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Tropa de ... abduction","reviewBody":"Ok I should not try to compare any movie coming from Brazil to the masterpiece (and I mean the sequel, although of course I also really liked the first Tropa de Elite movie too). This is a decent movie to say the least - and it is based on real events. So there is that for sure. And it is as down and gritty as you would it expect it to be.\n\nJust the first action scene ... there's no difference between this and a Hollywood Action movie with a similar theme. So no this is not polished, but not every movie needs that polish. The pacing could be a bit tighter, but that is a personal opinion on that, you may feel different. Overall more than decent and a testament on a certain period of time and what went down (more or less) in Brazil ...","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":481,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"genre":["Action","Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-01-23","keywords":"police,kidnapping,brazilian police","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1042708/","name":"Erom Cordeiro"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1499052/","name":"Thelmo Fernandes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0314078/","name":"Vanessa Gerbelli"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0025241/","name":"Vicente Amorim"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0687479/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026273/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0473686/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0025241/","name":"Vicente Amorim"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5312404/","name":"Aurélio Aragão"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2032393/","name":"Gustavo Bragança"}],"duration":"PT2H14M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Midnight Express
Midnight Express
programme.desc: Midnight Express: Directed by Alan Parker. With Brad Davis, Irene Miracle, Bo Hopkins, Paolo Bonacelli. Billy Hayes, an American college student, is caught smuggling drugs out of Turkey and thrown into prison." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0077928/","name":"Midnight Express","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDU1MjQ0YWMtMWQ2MS00NTdmLTg1MGItNDA5NTNkNTRhOTIyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Billy Hayes, an American college student, is caught smuggling drugs out of Turkey and thrown into prison.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0077928/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bodie"},"dateCreated":"2003-09-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"A good movie but keep in mind a near total fantasy.","reviewBody":"I like this movie a lot. I believe it is well done and is a movie that can be watched several times. However, as a person who has spent time in Turkey and read the book upon which the film is based, I know that it is a fictional story. It begins with a caption "a true story" but the only thing true about this movie is that someone named Billy Hayes was caught trying to smuggle a lot of hashish out of the country and was sent to jail. The events that supposedly happened to him in prison are fictional. I'm not saying that being in a Turkish prison is a good thing but the brutality presented is just plain fiction. Before you feel sorry for this guy remember that he was trying to smuggle drugs for re-sale in the US. Before you condemn Turkey remember that at the time Turkey was being pressured by the world community, particularly by the US, to do something about the drug flow coming out of the country. This is one movie that infuriates the Turkish government whenever it is shown and I believe rightly so because it caters to the notion that Turkey is some type or barbaric nation with a population that is incapable of human emotion or decency. Having lived in Turkey I know this to be totally false. In addition, with the exception of the skyline of Istanbul in the opening scene, none of the movie was filmed in Turkey. All of the Turks portrayed in the film, with the exception of the prosecutor, are Italian actors. The language spoken in the movie is not even Turkish for the most part. There are some phrases which are indeed Turkish but the majority of what is spoken is some other language. As I said however, I like this movie, in the same way that I like Star Trek; a great story but fiction none the less."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":76558,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"1978-08-10","keywords":"watching someone masturbate,social masturbation,bare chested male,1970s,woman exposing her breasts for a man","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Midnight Express","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2878734617","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWZhOTI3M2EtNGJlZC00OGY5LTk4YjgtOGZkZGE3MTY3ZTE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWZhOTI3M2EtNGJlZC00OGY5LTk4YjgtOGZkZGE3MTY3ZTE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Columbia Tristar"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001113/","name":"Brad Davis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0591968/","name":"Irene Miracle"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005019/","name":"Bo Hopkins"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000570/","name":"Alan Parker"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0032235/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000231/","name":"Oliver Stone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0370907/","name":"Billy Hayes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0388772/","name":"William Hoffer"}],"duration":"PT2H1M"}</script><metacontent="

All of the Turks portrayed in the film, with the exception of the prosecutor, are Italian actors. The language spoken in the movie is not even Turkish for the most part. There are some phrases which are indeed Turkish but the majority of what is spoken is some other language. As I said however, I like this movie, in the same way that I like Star Trek; a great story but fiction none the less.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":76558,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"1978-08-10","keywords":"watching someone masturbate,social masturbation,bare chested male,1970s,woman exposing her breasts for a man","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Midnight Express","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2878734617","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWZhOTI3M2EtNGJlZC00OGY5LTk4YjgtOGZkZGE3MTY3ZTE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWZhOTI3M2EtNGJlZC00OGY5LTk4YjgtOGZkZGE3MTY3ZTE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Columbia Tristar","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001113/","name":"Brad Davis","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0591968/","name":"Irene Miracle","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005019/","name":"Bo Hopkins"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000570/","name":"Alan Parker"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0032235/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000231/","name":"Oliver Stone","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0370907/","name":"Billy Hayes","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0388772/","name":"William Hoffer"],"duration":"PT2H1M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Friday's Child
Wolny duch
Friday's Child
programme.desc:
Friday's Child: Directed by A.J. Edwards. With Tye Sheridan, Imogen Poots, Caleb Landry Jones, Jeffrey Wright. Fresh out of foster care at age 18, a young drifter turns to petty crime to survive, and discovers an impossible love in an unlikely friend." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5342090/","name":"Friday's Child","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTViMWFhNjEtODgxMy00MWQ0LWI0M2MtYTdhNTE5NWM3NGFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTUyMzY1MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Fresh out of foster care at age 18, a young drifter turns to petty crime to survive, and discovers an impossible love in an unlikely friend.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5342090/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"TxMike"},"dateCreated":"2020-07-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Turning 18 and not totally prepared for adult life.","reviewBody":"This is a small, independent movie. It is mostly set in Waco, Texas and mostly shot there. I recognized some of the areas from my several visits a few years back. They even have a scene of throwing tortillas off the Waco Suspension Bridge, a ritual most Baylor college students go through.

Texas native Tye Sheridan is the main character, Richie, an orphan who has banged around the foster system for most of his life. He is just turning 18 and as such will be emancipated. But how prepared is a barely educated 18-yr-old to jump right into adult life?

This story is about that difficulty and the eventual trouble he finds himself in. It is hard to find a real purpose for this movie other than to tell an interesting fictional story but one which may be close to reality for some in a similar situation.

My wife and I watched this at home on DVD from our public library, however she abandoned it when things got a bit weird in the middle of the movie."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":832,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-11-22","keywords":"love,foster care,orphan,abandonment issues,emancipation","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Friday's Child","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2967650073","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWMyZGEyYzYtN2IxYi00YTgwLTlmN2EtYzhlNmExMGQ5MmE5XkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWMyZGEyYzYtN2IxYi00YTgwLTlmN2EtYzhlNmExMGQ5MmE5XkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4446467/","name":"Tye Sheridan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1782299/","name":"Imogen Poots"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2655177/","name":"Caleb Landry Jones"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2270935/","name":"A.J. Edwards"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0657444/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0603497/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2270935/","name":"A.J. Edwards"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

Texas native Tye Sheridan is the main character, Richie, an orphan who has banged around the foster system for most of his life. He is just turning 18 and as such will be emancipated. But how prepared is a barely educated 18-yr-old to jump right into adult life?

This story is about that difficulty and the eventual trouble he finds himself in. It is hard to find a real purpose for this movie other than to tell an interesting fictional story but one which may be close to reality for some in a similar situation.

My wife and I watched this at home on DVD from our public library, however she abandoned it when things got a bit weird in the middle of the movie.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":832,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-11-22","keywords":"love,foster care,orphan,abandonment issues,emancipation","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Friday's Child","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2967650073","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWMyZGEyYzYtN2IxYi00YTgwLTlmN2EtYzhlNmExMGQ5MmE5XkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWMyZGEyYzYtN2IxYi00YTgwLTlmN2EtYzhlNmExMGQ5MmE5XkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4446467/","name":"Tye Sheridan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1782299/","name":"Imogen Poots","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2655177/","name":"Caleb Landry Jones"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2270935/","name":"A.J. programme.desc: Vice: Directed by Adam McKay. With Christian Bale, Amy Adams, Steve Carell, Sam Rockwell. Bush, reshaping the country and the globe in ways that we still feel today." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6266538/","name":"Vice","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY1NjM0MzgxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDc4NTY0NjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of Dick Cheney, an unassuming bureaucratic Washington insider, who quietly wielded immense power as Vice President to George W. Bush, reshaping the country and the globe in ways that we still feel today.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6266538/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"danielledecolombie"},"dateCreated":"2018-12-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Laughing nervously","reviewBody":"In 2008, Italian director Paolo Sorrentino made a film about a, then, still living sinister political figure Giuliano Andreotti. The ferociousness of the portrait was acceptable to the public at large because it was presented as a stylish, slightly surreal comedy. Adam McKay sets VICE in a more realistic universe but the results are just as pungent, disturbing and funny. Christian Bale is spookily perfect. And Amy Adams is a modern day Lady Macbeth of major proportions. The most unsettling part of the whole experience, because Vice is an experience, is the knowledge that this are the people chosen by the people. The fact that countries have the governments they deserve gives me a chill in 2018. A remarkable film with remarkable performances. Bravo.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":132932,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-12-25","keywords":"u.s. vice president,iraq war,u.s. government,hit by a car,heart attack","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"30s Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1144502809","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzNiMmEwZTYtOTM0OS00ODFkLWE4ZjItMDdlOTMyNjA4YmU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzNiMmEwZTYtOTM0OS00ODFkLWE4ZjItMDdlOTMyNjA4YmU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000288/","name":"Christian Bale"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0010736/","name":"Amy Adams"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0136797/","name":"Steve Carell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0570912/","name":"Adam McKay"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0323215/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0186190/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0136967/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0570912/","name":"Adam McKay"}],"duration":"PT2H12M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Nonajoler Kabbo: Directed by Rezwan Shahriar Sumit. With Fazlur Rahman Babu, Shatabdi Wadud, Titas Zia, Tasnova Tamanna. programme.title: Siberia and Him
Syberia
Sybir i on
programme.desc: Siberia and Him: Directed by Viatcheslav Kopturevskiy. With Ilya Shubochkin, Viatcheslav Kopturevskiy, Anastasia Voskresenskaya, Irina Novokreshennuh. Two men fall in love in a run-down town of Siberia, Russia." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7304136/","name":"Siberia and Him","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmVkYjNhZTctOWRmOS00ZjJmLWFmMTQtMjJkNGM2N2JmMGJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjk1ODI3NDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two men fall in love in a run-down town of Siberia, Russia.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7304136/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"fabiog-26-358885"},"dateCreated":"2020-07-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"A tragic Russian "modern story".","reviewBody":"In a remote, small and modest rural town in the interior of Russia, a story happens, which could be dramatic even without the homosexual seasoning. If you include that (in a very homophobic society like Russia is), it becomes horribly suffocating, unbearable, and with no apparent possible solution, unless it is tragic. Everything takes place in the midst of the unlimited and timeless natural beauty of the Siberian landscape. And this story happens to young, strong, beautiful and common people, with the simple desire to live and love. The type and employment position of some of them does not favor at all. But ... Stop! We cannot accept that the mentioned circumstances justify what happens in the film. There are always possibilities of giving better answers. For one it might have been walking away, even if it hurts a lot. For the other, give up positions, income, and family, and also decide to leave, to another city and start again. Perhaps, unfortunately, estrangement and loneliness were the only other option, in this case, at least at first. Perhaps this could also have caused pain and suffering in them and in the whole family. But what finally happens in the film is a tragedy too disproportionate for the 21st century. I do not want to blame people who are already victims of an oppressive culture, since this oppression leads some to go crazy and commit acts of madness (in other countries, sometimes, there are other kind of oppression and acts of madness) ... What I mean is, no matter where we live, please do not believe that there is no possible way out. On the other hand, the film is very beautiful, with good shots, good actors, and good direction. A valuable film to watch and reflect on.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":279,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-07-18","keywords":"gay,russia,murder,self murder,nature","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9232328/","name":"Ilya Shubochkin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3786136/","name":"Viatcheslav Kopturevskiy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11569958/","name":"Anastasia Voskresenskaya"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3786136/","name":"Viatcheslav Kopturevskiy"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3786136/","name":"Viatcheslav Kopturevskiy"}],"duration":"PT1H17M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Vénus noire
Czarna Wenus
Venus noire
programme.desc:
Vénus noire: Directed by Abdellatif Kechiche. With Yahima Torres, Andre Jacobs, Olivier Gourmet, Elina Löwensohn. In the 19th century, a black woman from Africa is on display throughout Europe as an exotic curiosity." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1401643/","name":"Vénus noire","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmMwMmVhZTMtOGVlOC00ZGJiLThhNmUtZDhmM2FhY2UwNTUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0ODAyOTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the 19th century, a black woman from Africa is on display throughout Europe as an exotic curiosity.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1401643/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mrcibubur"},"dateCreated":"2013-01-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Extraordinary Film about an Extraordinary Woman","reviewBody":"I finally watched this movie earlier today with a sorrowful heart after first hearing about it a couple of years ago. hard to get it here in Indonesia on DVD, finally got it on two split You Tube downloads.

Yes this is not a film for the faint hearted, it is extremely graphic and harsh in its direction to say the least and certainly long at 2 hours 40 minutes (comparable with the Hobbit which I saw on new Years Eve).

The film is an artistic portrayal of a dignified South African tribal woman who is abused and misled once she arrives first to England and then later to Paris. However, it lacks artistic direction and balance. Not a contradiction in terms exactly.

for example, the opening scene shows her being exhibited in a medical seminar and the end of the movie displays her physical remains which would later be put in a Paris Musueum. My point is that the Director could have taken more attention to detail and put the lady into a greater prospective, perhaps a prequel to the main part of the story (the recent Johnny Depp movie 'Dark shadows" a case in point) showing the lady in her tribal land and how she met the Doctor before arriving to England. The explanation in the movie is all too bland and passed over for the most part. The same applied for the ending although there were some explanatory subtitles and compensating visual glimpses of when she was returned to South Africa.

What we see in this film is no different from what still goes on in our world today but in a different way. We go-global in order to see the very thing that this humble woman was subjected to and we pay to see it, sometimes on the internet - animals as well as humans - and it is only perhaps in western countries that there are anti-voice against the abuse in circuses.

We should watch this film and want to be shocked. Unlike the spectators shown throughout the film, we have the benefit of a greater education and enhanced knowledge but abuse such as Saartje Baartman is shown to endure in the movie, goes on to this day.

There was a lack of cohesion at times in the transition from going London to Paris and then later when Saartje found herself in the Brothels. Yes, she drank and smoked and was inevitably sensitive and temperamental given her real life role play but this is indeed an extraordinary film about an extraordinary woman who is extraordinary for her courage and determination and not so unordinary from any other woman except for her buttocks and her labia, according to the medical scientists.

I certainly enjoyed this film more than the "Hobbit' which bored the pants off me (except for the special effects) and yes 'Venus Noire' is slow and often repetitive but I can share empathy with the Director and in an unkind, cruel, uncomfortable way, this is entertainment.

On a general note, there is no swearing or offensive violence, despite the harsh treatment Saartje Baartman endured while away from South Africa. Yes, she is mostly naked for large sections of the film and there are a couple of later scenes in Paris where she is in a sexual situation but apart from that, this is not a film for a sexual voyeur and don't expect to see flashes of an unusually large labia because you will not.

The standard of acting in this film is excellent. I may be wrong here but this is a French film and so good sub-titles in English or language of your choice are important. I suggest that there are a lot of other movies out there who will shock and offend you a whole lot more than this one.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2640,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2010-10-27","keywords":"brothel,nudity,racism,exhibition,female nudity","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1135788313","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTM1MzZhZjUtNmU4MC00NjcxLWI1NDktYTRjNDY1NmVlMDBjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTM1MzZhZjUtNmU4MC00NjcxLWI1NDktYTRjNDY1NmVlMDBjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4070086/","name":"Yahima Torres"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0414325/","name":"Andre Jacobs"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0332709/","name":"Olivier Gourmet"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0444244/","name":"Abdellatif Kechiche"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022545/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056755/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028908/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0444244/","name":"Abdellatif Kechiche"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0480308/","name":"Ghalya Lacroix"}],"duration":"PT2H42M"}</script><metacontent="

In the 19th century, a black woman from Africa is on display throughout Europe as an exotic curiosity." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1401643/","name":"Vénus noire","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmMwMmVhZTMtOGVlOC00ZGJiLThhNmUtZDhmM2FhY2UwNTUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0ODAyOTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the 19th century, a black woman from Africa is on display throughout Europe as an exotic curiosity.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1401643/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"mrcibubur","dateCreated":"2013-01-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Extraordinary Film about an Extraordinary Woman","reviewBody":"I finally watched this movie earlier today with a sorrowful heart after first hearing about it a couple of years ago. hard to get it here in Indonesia on DVD, finally got it on two split You Tube downloads.

Yes this is not a film for the faint hearted, it is extremely graphic and harsh in its direction to say the least and certainly long at 2 hours 40 minutes (comparable with the Hobbit which I saw on new Years Eve).

The film is an artistic portrayal of a dignified South African tribal woman who is abused and misled once she arrives first to England and then later to Paris. However, it lacks artistic direction and balance. Not a contradiction in terms exactly.

for example, the opening scene shows her being exhibited in a medical seminar and the end of the movie displays her physical remains which would later be put in a Paris Musueum. My point is that the Director could have taken more attention to detail and put the lady into a greater prospective, perhaps a prequel to the main part of the story (the recent Johnny Depp movie 'Dark shadows" a case in point) showing the lady in her tribal land and how she met the Doctor before arriving to England. The explanation in the movie is all too bland and passed over for the most part. The same applied for the ending although there were some explanatory subtitles and compensating visual glimpses of when she was returned to South Africa.

What we see in this film is no different from what still goes on in our world today but in a different way. We go-global in order to see the very thing that this humble woman was subjected to and we pay to see it, sometimes on the internet - animals as well as humans - and it is only perhaps in western countries that there are anti-voice against the abuse in circuses.

We should watch this film and want to be shocked. Unlike the spectators shown throughout the film, we have the benefit of a greater education and enhanced knowledge but abuse such as Saartje Baartman is shown to endure in the movie, goes on to this day.

There was a lack of cohesion at times in the transition from going London to Paris and then later when Saartje found herself in the Brothels. Yes, she drank and smoked and was inevitably sensitive and temperamental given her real life role play but this is indeed an extraordinary film about an extraordinary woman who is extraordinary for her courage and determination and not so unordinary from any other woman except for her buttocks and her labia, according to the medical scientists.

I certainly enjoyed this film more than the "Hobbit' which bored the pants off me (except for the special effects) and yes 'Venus Noire' is slow and often repetitive but I can share empathy with the Director and in an unkind, cruel, uncomfortable way, this is entertainment.

On a general note, there is no swearing or offensive violence, despite the harsh treatment Saartje Baartman endured while away from South Africa. Yes, she is mostly naked for large sections of the film and there are a couple of later scenes in Paris where she is in a sexual situation but apart from that, this is not a film for a sexual voyeur and don't expect to see flashes of an unusually large labia because you will not.

The standard of acting in this film is excellent. I may be wrong here but this is a French film and so good sub-titles in English or language of your choice are important. I suggest that there are a lot of other movies out there who will shock and offend you a whole lot more than this one.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2640,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2010-10-27","keywords":"brothel,nudity,racism,exhibition,female nudity","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1135788313","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTM1MzZhZjUtNmU4MC00NjcxLWI1NDktYTRjNDY1NmVlMDBjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTM1MzZhZjUtNmU4MC00NjcxLWI1NDktYTRjNDY1NmVlMDBjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4070086/","name":"Yahima Torres","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0414325/","name":"Andre Jacobs","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0332709/","name":"Olivier Gourmet"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0444244/","name":"Abdellatif Kechiche"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022545/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056755/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028908/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0444244/","name":"Abdellatif Kechiche","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0480308/","name":"Ghalya Lacroix"],"duration":"PT2H42M"</script><metacontent="

Bush, reshaping the country and the globe in ways that we still feel today." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6266538/","name":"Vice","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY1NjM0MzgxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDc4NTY0NjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of Dick Cheney, an unassuming bureaucratic Washington insider, who quietly wielded immense power as Vice President to George W. Bush, reshaping the country and the globe in ways that we still feel today.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6266538/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"danielledecolombie"},"dateCreated":"2018-12-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Laughing nervously","reviewBody":"In 2008, Italian director Paolo Sorrentino made a film about a, then, still living sinister political figure Giuliano Andreotti. The ferociousness of the portrait was acceptable to the public at large because it was presented as a stylish, slightly surreal comedy. Adam McKay sets VICE in a more realistic universe but the results are just as pungent, disturbing and funny. Christian Bale is spookily perfect. And Amy Adams is a modern day Lady Macbeth of major proportions. The most unsettling part of the whole experience, because Vice is an experience, is the knowledge that this are the people chosen by the people. The fact that countries have the governments they deserve gives me a chill in 2018. A remarkable film with remarkable performances. Bravo.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":132932,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-12-25","keywords":"u.s. vice president,iraq war,u.s. government,hit by a car,heart attack","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"30s Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1144502809","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzNiMmEwZTYtOTM0OS00ODFkLWE4ZjItMDdlOTMyNjA4YmU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzNiMmEwZTYtOTM0OS00ODFkLWE4ZjItMDdlOTMyNjA4YmU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000288/","name":"Christian Bale"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0010736/","name":"Amy Adams"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0136797/","name":"Steve Carell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0570912/","name":"Adam McKay"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0323215/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0186190/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0136967/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0570912/","name":"Adam McKay"}],"duration":"PT2H12M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Long Day's Dying
Kres długiego dnia
The Long Day's Dying
programme.desc:
The Long Day's Dying: Directed by Peter Collinson. With David Hemmings, Tony Beckley, Tom Bell, Alan Dobie. The saga of three British soldiers and their German captive as they trek through the European countryside." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0063237/","name":"The Long Day's Dying","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWEyMzM4ZGUtMmI2NC00OTA5LTljNjQtMzNiODQwM2E2ZTcwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjI4MjA5MzA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The saga of three British soldiers and their German captive as they trek through the European countryside.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0063237/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"adam-hill5"},"dateCreated":"2010-02-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Read the book","reviewBody":"I first read the book, when I was a young teenager, then saw the film late one night. About a year ago I checked it out on IMDb and discovered no copies available. I then hit the web and found a site that offers War Films, soooo glad that I did, ordered a copy and sat back and was able to confirm why I wanted to see it again.

In my opinion to really enjoy the film I suggest you read get a copy of the book and then watch the film. The book is no longer in print but I did track a copy down via E-bay, the Author Alan White was a commando/paratrooper during the 2nd world war taking part in disparate clandestine operations and this was his first book. It is written by someone who knows and this fact I believe gives the book and film authenticity. I have not given the film a ten only because of the nature of the ending of the film, not as good as the book. There are a couple of plot lines that differ from the book also, which is strange as the book is not about the large scale nature of war but about the individual in war. The film illustrates this exceptionally well. I have the copy of the book to let my son read and then the film to let him watch, in that order.

If you can track it down the book and the film then it is definitely worth it and I only wish that it was more readily available for more to read and see, one of my all best war films, ever!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":470,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","War"],"datePublished":"1968-05-28","keywords":"shot to death,no survivors,farmhouse,corpse,cult film","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0376101/","name":"David Hemmings"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0065777/","name":"Tony Beckley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0068552/","name":"Tom Bell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0172772/","name":"Peter Collinson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010407/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0924430/","name":"Alan White"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0939606/","name":"Charles Wood"}],"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Nonajoler Kabbo
Sól w naszej wodzie
Nonajoler Kabbo
programme.desc: Nonajoler Kabbo: Directed by Rezwan Shahriar Sumit. With Fazlur Rahman Babu, Shatabdi Wadud, Titas Zia, Tasnova Tamanna. When a sculptor visits a remote fishing village on the Bangladeshi Delta, he finds himself center stage in a primal, elemental conflict between land and sea, man and nature, past and future." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6955210/","name":"Nonajoler Kabbo","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWEyNjM3NjYtNWI1Ni00NDY0LThhZDEtYjgyOWU0YWEzZTVhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjM4NDY0MDA@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a sculptor visits a remote fishing village on the Bangladeshi Delta, he finds himself center stage in a primal, elemental conflict between land and sea, man and nature, past and future.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6955210/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MiguelAReina"},"dateCreated":"2021-02-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"More attractive in form than in substance","reviewBody":"The issue of the confrontation between the traditions of a small fishing village and a newly arrived sculptor is not original, but the film has a beautiful visual proposal, sustained in an excellent cinematography by Chananun Chotrungroj, which takes advantage of natural light and landscape. It is a film that is enjoyed in its form even though it does not contain a particularly attractive proposal.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":109,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-10-14","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2610419/","name":"Fazlur Rahman Babu"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2376908/","name":"Shatabdi Wadud"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7645046/","name":"Titas Zia"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4081190/","name":"Rezwan Shahriar Sumit"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0199929/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0823106/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4081190/","name":"Rezwan Shahriar Sumit"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

Koda
Coda
programme.desc: The Room: Directed by Christian Volckman. With Olga Kurylenko, Kevin Janssens, Joshua Wilson, John Flanders. Matt and Kate buy an isolated house. While moving, they discover a strange room that grants them an unlimited number of material wishes. But, since Kate has had two miscarriages, what they miss the most is a child." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8485364/","name":"The Room","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTExNTU3ZTMtMmMxNi00MjkyLTg1MWUtOGNmZGM2ZmU0YWFlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzA4MDA0Mjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"Matt and Kate buy an isolated house. While moving, they discover a strange room that grants them an unlimited number of material wishes. But, since Kate has had two miscarriages, what they miss the most is a child.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8485364/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"painfield"},"dateCreated":"2019-11-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Plenty of potential, not so good execution","reviewBody":"I would have loved to rate this movie higher, there's plenty of potential in the concept and some of the ideas in the movie but I couldn't stand the characters. Their interactions with each other, and their development doesn't follow human rules, they are what is needed in the scene and that creates a disconnect that avoided me to enjoy the film. Most of it is also completely predictable, except for a twist near the end, and I'm not sure if I couldn't see due to the incoherence of it all at that point. I would have rated it at least 5 because it feels like a movie despite its flaws, but there are so many good reviews I feel like I need to warn others, thus this review.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":17779,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama","Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2019-11-06","keywords":"miscarriage,secluded house,secret room,isolated house,magic","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Room","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi487898649","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDgyNWJjODQtNTdmZC00NDc3LTk1MGEtNzYyZmJmM2I1ODBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDgyNWJjODQtNTdmZC00NDc3LTk1MGEtNzYyZmJmM2I1ODBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 1"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1385871/","name":"Olga Kurylenko"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1822271/","name":"Kevin Janssens"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9920292/","name":"Joshua Wilson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1466691/","name":"Christian Volckman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0076118/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0071388/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0395973/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1466691/","name":"Christian Volckman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1162056/","name":"Eric Forestier"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1615033/","name":"Gaia Guasti"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Long Day's Dying
Kres długiego dnia
The Long Day's Dying
programme.desc:
The Long Day's Dying: Directed by Peter Collinson. With David Hemmings, Tony Beckley, Tom Bell, Alan Dobie. The saga of three British soldiers and their German captive as they trek through the European countryside." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0063237/","name":"The Long Day's Dying","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWEyMzM4ZGUtMmI2NC00OTA5LTljNjQtMzNiODQwM2E2ZTcwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjI4MjA5MzA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The saga of three British soldiers and their German captive as they trek through the European countryside.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0063237/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"adam-hill5"},"dateCreated":"2010-02-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Read the book","reviewBody":"I first read the book, when I was a young teenager, then saw the film late one night. About a year ago I checked it out on IMDb and discovered no copies available. I then hit the web and found a site that offers War Films, soooo glad that I did, ordered a copy and sat back and was able to confirm why I wanted to see it again.

In my opinion to really enjoy the film I suggest you read get a copy of the book and then watch the film. The book is no longer in print but I did track a copy down via E-bay, the Author Alan White was a commando/paratrooper during the 2nd world war taking part in disparate clandestine operations and this was his first book. It is written by someone who knows and this fact I believe gives the book and film authenticity. I have not given the film a ten only because of the nature of the ending of the film, not as good as the book. There are a couple of plot lines that differ from the book also, which is strange as the book is not about the large scale nature of war but about the individual in war. The film illustrates this exceptionally well. I have the copy of the book to let my son read and then the film to let him watch, in that order.

If you can track it down the book and the film then it is definitely worth it and I only wish that it was more readily available for more to read and see, one of my all best war films, ever!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":470,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","War"],"datePublished":"1968-05-28","keywords":"shot to death,no survivors,farmhouse,corpse,cult film","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0376101/","name":"David Hemmings"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0065777/","name":"Tony Beckley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0068552/","name":"Tom Bell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0172772/","name":"Peter Collinson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010407/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0924430/","name":"Alan White"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0939606/","name":"Charles Wood"}],"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

The saga of three British soldiers and their German captive as they trek through the European countryside." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0063237/","name":"The Long Day's Dying","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWEyMzM4ZGUtMmI2NC00OTA5LTljNjQtMzNiODQwM2E2ZTcwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjI4MjA5MzA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The saga of three British soldiers and their German captive as they trek through the European countryside.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0063237/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"adam-hill5","dateCreated":"2010-02-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Read the book","reviewBody":"I first read the book, when I was a young teenager, then saw the film late one night. About a year ago I checked it out on IMDb and discovered no copies available. I then hit the web and found a site that offers War Films, soooo glad that I did, ordered a copy and sat back and was able to confirm why I wanted to see it again.

In my opinion to really enjoy the film I suggest you read get a copy of the book and then watch the film. The book is no longer in print but I did track a copy down via E-bay, the Author Alan White was a commando/paratrooper during the 2nd world war taking part in disparate clandestine operations and this was his first book. It is written by someone who knows and this fact I believe gives the book and film authenticity. I have not given the film a ten only because of the nature of the ending of the film, not as good as the book. There are a couple of plot lines that differ from the book also, which is strange as the book is not about the large scale nature of war but about the individual in war. The film illustrates this exceptionally well. I have the copy of the book to let my son read and then the film to let him watch, in that order.

If you can track it down the book and the film then it is definitely worth it and I only wish that it was more readily available for more to read and see, one of my all best war films, ever!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":470,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","War"],"datePublished":"1968-05-28","keywords":"shot to death,no survivors,farmhouse,corpse,cult film","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0376101/","name":"David Hemmings","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0065777/","name":"Tony Beckley","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0068552/","name":"Tom Bell"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0172772/","name":"Peter Collinson"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010407/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0924430/","name":"Alan White","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0939606/","name":"Charles Wood"],"duration":"PT1H35M"</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Smoke: Directed by Wayne Wang. With Giancarlo Esposito, José Zúñiga, Stephen Gevedon, Harvey Keitel. A Brooklyn smoke shop is the center of neighborhood activity, and the stories of its customers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0114478/","name":"Smoke","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjUwYTdiYjItNTgzNS00MmQ3LWJlMDctODMyNTkxMjIxMDgwL2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTA0MjU0Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A Brooklyn smoke shop is the center of neighborhood activity, and the stories of its customers.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0114478/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"coop-16"},"dateCreated":"2000-04-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"A quiet masterpiece of the cinema","reviewBody":"I cannot begin to convey the intellectual and spiritual riches of this exquisite, almost transcendental film. I have rarely seen a motion picture with better acting or a more literate, insightful script.Harvey Keitel, John Hurt, Stockard Channing, Ashley Judd, Forrest Whittaker, and all the other players contribute some of their finest performances.The film itself ends with a "Christmas story' which conveys more of the religious-and humanist-meaning of that holiday than a thousand scmaltzy TV specials.Watch this movie, watch it carefully. Rarely has the beauty and sublimity concealed behind the facade of quotidian existence been better conveyed in a film.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":35258,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"1995-06-09","keywords":"smoke,cigarette smoking,death of wife,year 1990,summer","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Smoke","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2536243225","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjE3MWZjN2EtMTRjMi00MjFiLWI5NWUtNjJmOTFlMGM0ZDJmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjE3MWZjN2EtMTRjMi00MjFiLWI5NWUtNjJmOTFlMGM0ZDJmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Miramax"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000172/","name":"Harvey Keitel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000458/","name":"William Hurt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002064/","name":"Giancarlo Esposito"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0911061/","name":"Wayne Wang"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022594/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0055105/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0070053/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000808/","name":"Paul Auster"}],"duration":"PT1H52M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Whiskey Tango Foxtrot
Whiskey Tango Foxtrot
programme.desc:
Whiskey Tango Foxtrot: Directed by Glenn Ficarra, John Requa. With Tina Fey, Margot Robbie, Martin Freeman, Alfred Molina. A journalist recounts her wartime coverage in Afghanistan." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3553442/","name":"Whiskey Tango Foxtrot","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIxOTIzMTM5OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDIxNTA1NzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A journalist recounts her wartime coverage in Afghanistan.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3553442/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jim9tan"},"dateCreated":"2016-03-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Has soul","reviewBody":"I am impressed. This is one of the few films which has inspired me to read the source material; the autobiography by the journalist Kim Baker..

The film starts with comic moments as greenhorn middle-America Kim Baker (Tina Fey) arrives in a war zone. Then, the film darkens as it touches on the corruption of the expatriate community and the seduction of war reporting.

Surprisingly, Tina Fey can act in a dramatic role. Being comic with a straight face, facing danger, fending off romeos, and falling in love. In the end, Kim Baker rediscovers herself and returns home.

The film deals superficially with the horror faced by Afghan civilians and the root causes of the insurgency. However, this is the story of a white woman in a foreign land.

Overall, the film was predictable but lightly touches the soul. Credit to the editor for walking the difficult line between entertainment and horror. The rest of the cast did a creditable job."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":51354,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2016-03-04","keywords":"afghanistan,journalist,war on terrorism,kabul afghanistan,karaoke","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2132324889","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU4NjkyODc3MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTcxNTA1NzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU4NjkyODc3MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTcxNTA1NzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Based on the Kim Barker's memoir, Tina Fey plays a journalist reporting from war-town Afghanistan and Pakistan."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0275486/","name":"Tina Fey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3053338/","name":"Margot Robbie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0293509/","name":"Martin Freeman"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0275629/","name":"Glenn Ficarra"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0720135/","name":"John Requa"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0013731/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0199243/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1061622/","name":"Robert Carlock"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5092324/","name":"Kim Barker"}],"duration":"PT1H52M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Les sauvages: Created by Sabri Louatah, Rebecca Zlotowski. With Marina Foïs, Roschdy Zem, Amira Casar, Souheila Yacoub. Present-day France. The first presidential candidate of Algerian descent is on the brink of power. But on the night of the election, he is shot, bringing turmoil to two families and the entire nation." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt10371844/","name":"Les sauvages","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGNiZTA4MTMtZjg3Mi00MmU0LTk2ZmUtYjMwNWVkOTA2YTViXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODE1MTQ2ODQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Present-day France. The first presidential candidate of Algerian descent is on the brink of power. But on the night of the election, he is shot, bringing turmoil to two families and the entire nation.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10371844/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bertbollen"},"dateCreated":"2020-04-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Loved it but","reviewBody":"The Marion Character is completely unnecessary. Her role is done after the assassination attempt, so go home. No agency would ever have allowed her to play the role she does. The story would have been stronger without her meddling in family affairs, she is just sitting in her car letting Fouad do the actual work. And why is her name mentioned first? I'd say Fouad and Jasmine are the actual key players.\n\nAll the rest: loved it! The relationships between the members of these two families are displayed in a gripping manner and I must say that I really liked all the characters and the way the actors make them come alive. The struggle between the French life and the Algerian way of living is tense and I think the makers of this serie nailed it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":311,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-09-23","keywords":"tv mini series","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0283997/","name":"Marina Foïs"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0954704/","name":"Roschdy Zem"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0142972/","name":"Amira Casar"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054547/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0038772/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4885625/","name":"Sabri Louatah"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2294243/","name":"Rebecca Zlotowski"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Teaser Saison 1 [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1472118553","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjk4OTQ3MDMtNDZiMi00MjVlLWJmYmYtMTYzZDk3YWEzYWNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQW1haXdlbm4@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjk4OTQ3MDMtNDZiMi00MjVlLWJmYmYtMTYzZDk3YWEzYWNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQW1haXdlbm4@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

I'd say Fouad and Jasmine are the actual key players.\n\nAll the rest: loved it! The relationships between the members of these two families are displayed in a gripping manner and I must say that I really liked all the characters and the way the actors make them come alive. The struggle between the French life and the Algerian way of living is tense and I think the makers of this serie nailed it.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":311,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7,"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-09-23","keywords":"tv mini series","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0283997/","name":"Marina Foïs","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0954704/","name":"Roschdy Zem","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0142972/","name":"Amira Casar"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054547/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0038772/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4885625/","name":"Sabri Louatah","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2294243/","name":"Rebecca Zlotowski"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Teaser Saison 1 [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1472118553","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjk4OTQ3MDMtNDZiMi00MjVlLWJmYmYtMTYzZDk3YWEzYWNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQW1haXdlbm4@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjk4OTQ3MDMtNDZiMi00MjVlLWJmYmYtMTYzZDk3YWEzYWNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQW1haXdlbm4@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Bones: Created by Hart Hanson. With Emily Deschanel, David Boreanaz, Michaela Conlin, T.J. Thyne. Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0460627/","name":"Bones","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA3ODMxMzM5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDM1NjU0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0460627/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Alison107"},"dateCreated":"2005-09-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just Hope It Stays On the Air","reviewBody":"I didn't expect to like it as much as I liked it. In fact, it's a sure sign of cancellation how much I like this show. I never like crime shows. My mom loves them, but I find them dull, because they're about plots not characters. This is a crime show about characters (not as good as "The Closer" -- the crime show I adored this summer -- mind you), and I enjoyed it. At times, it seemed far-fetched, and the whole Senator plot-point in the pilot seemed awful easy, but the dialogue worked, the characters intrigue me, and the chemistry is great. I expect good things from it.\n\nAlison"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":145903,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2005-09-13","keywords":"forensic anthropologist,investigation,washington d.c.,crime scene investigation,murder investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0221043/","name":"Emily Deschanel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0174819/","name":"Michaela Conlin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0212869/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046572/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056447/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0361274/","name":"Hart Hanson"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bones: The Complete Seventh Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi748140825","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDA2MGRiODItYWI4Zi00ODdhLTg0OWYtMDQ1NmIyODQ2ZGNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDA2MGRiODItYWI4Zi00ODdhLTg0OWYtMDQ1NmIyODQ2ZGNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Bones: The Complete Seventh Season"}}</script><metacontent="

This is a crime show about characters (not as good as "The Closer" -- the crime show I adored this summer -- mind you), and I enjoyed it. At times, it seemed far-fetched, and the whole Senator plot-point in the pilot seemed awful easy, but the dialogue worked, the characters intrigue me, and the chemistry is great. A decidedly odd couple with ulterior motives convince Dr. Grant to go to Isla Sorna for a holiday, but their unexpected landing startles the island's new inhabitants." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0163025/","name":"Jurassic Park III","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDMyZGJjOGItYjJkZC00MDVlLWE0Y2YtZGIwMDExYWE3MGQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDYyMDk5MTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"A decidedly odd couple with ulterior motives convince Dr. Grant to go to Isla Sorna for a holiday, but their unexpected landing startles the island's new inhabitants.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0163025/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"KoolCatReviews"},"dateCreated":"2020-04-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Always slightly under rated compared to the squel","reviewBody":"I have always felt this movie was better than the second although not as good as the original. Za szybcy, za wściekli
2 Fast 2 Furious
programme.desc: 2 Fast 2 Furious: Directed by John Singleton. With Paul Walker, Tyrese Gibson, Eva Mendes, Cole Hauser. Former cop Brian O'Conner is called upon to bust a dangerous criminal and he recruits the help of a former childhood friend and street racer who has a chance to redeem himself." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0322259/","name":"2 Fast 2 Furious","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzExYjcyYWMtY2JkOC00NDUwLTg2OTgtMDI3MGY2OWQzMDE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Former cop Brian O'Conner is called upon to bust a dangerous criminal and he recruits the help of a former childhood friend and street racer who has a chance to redeem himself.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0322259/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"hoxjennifer"},"dateCreated":"2015-07-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"The cars are better than the first...","reviewBody":"The cars, the stunts and the eye candy (Eva Mendes) are better than the first. But unlike the first, 2 Fast 2 Furious still boasts a lacklustre plot. Nevertheless, it's a great "bro" movie for the guys. The partnership between Roman Pierce (Tyrese Gibson) and Brian O'Connor (Paul Walker) is amusing and works well as they team up and do next to impossible driving stunts with each other. The slight romance between Monica Fuentes (Eva Mendes) and Brian O'Connor is predictable, but it's not to the same extent as the first one - just a bit of flirtation but not to the extent of a full fledged relationship. The Miami backdrop adds to the "upgrade" feel of the second movie in the Fast & Furious franchise. Flashy and full of action is 2 Fast, 2 Furious.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":262921,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2003-06-06","keywords":"undercover agent,racing,miami florida,sequel,motor vehicle","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"2 Fast 2 Furious","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2897412377","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDIyZWUxZjgtMTA1ZC00YWQxLTg1NWMtMGI5MjBkMGE0MzRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDIyZWUxZjgtMTA1ZC00YWQxLTg1NWMtMGI5MjBkMGE0MzRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Universal Studios Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0908094/","name":"Paul Walker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0879085/","name":"Tyrese Gibson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0369513/","name":"Cole Hauser"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005436/","name":"John Singleton"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011134/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0106989/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0860155/","name":"Gary Scott Thompson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0104973/","name":"Michael Brandt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0351929/","name":"Derek Haas"}],"duration":"PT1H47M"}</script><metacontent="

Kości
Bones
programme.desc: Bones: Created by Hart Hanson. With Emily Deschanel, David Boreanaz, Michaela Conlin, T.J. Thyne. Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0460627/","name":"Bones","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA3ODMxMzM5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDM1NjU0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0460627/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Alison107"},"dateCreated":"2005-09-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just Hope It Stays On the Air","reviewBody":"I didn't expect to like it as much as I liked it. In fact, it's a sure sign of cancellation how much I like this show. I never like crime shows. My mom loves them, but I find them dull, because they're about plots not characters. This is a crime show about characters (not as good as "The Closer" -- the crime show I adored this summer -- mind you), and I enjoyed it. At times, it seemed far-fetched, and the whole Senator plot-point in the pilot seemed awful easy, but the dialogue worked, the characters intrigue me, and the chemistry is great. I expect good things from it.\n\nAlison"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":145903,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2005-09-13","keywords":"forensic anthropologist,investigation,washington d.c.,crime scene investigation,murder investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0221043/","name":"Emily Deschanel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0174819/","name":"Michaela Conlin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0212869/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046572/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056447/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0361274/","name":"Hart Hanson"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bones: The Complete Seventh Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi748140825","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDA2MGRiODItYWI4Zi00ODdhLTg0OWYtMDQ1NmIyODQ2ZGNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDA2MGRiODItYWI4Zi00ODdhLTg0OWYtMDQ1NmIyODQ2ZGNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Bones: The Complete Seventh Season"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0460627, Title: Bones, --- Description: Bones: Created by Hart Hanson. With Emily Deschanel, David Boreanaz, Michaela Conlin, T.J. Thyne. Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0460627/","name":"Bones","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA3ODMxMzM5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDM1NjU0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0460627/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Alison107","dateCreated":"2005-09-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just Hope It Stays On the Air","reviewBody":"I didn't expect to like it as much as I liked it. In fact, it's a sure sign of cancellation how much I like this show. I never like crime shows. My mom loves them, but I find them dull, because they're about plots not characters. This is a crime show about characters (not as good as "The Closer" -- the crime show I adored this summer -- mind you), and I enjoyed it. At times, it seemed far-fetched, and the whole Senator plot-point in the pilot seemed awful easy, but the dialogue worked, the characters intrigue me, and the chemistry is great. I expect good things from it.\n\nAlison","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":145903,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2005-09-13","keywords":"forensic anthropologist,investigation,washington d.c.,crime scene investigation,murder investigation","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0221043/","name":"Emily Deschanel","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0174819/","name":"Michaela Conlin"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0212869/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046572/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056447/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0361274/","name":"Hart Hanson"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bones: The Complete Seventh Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi748140825","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDA2MGRiODItYWI4Zi00ODdhLTg0OWYtMDQ1NmIyODQ2ZGNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDA2MGRiODItYWI4Zi00ODdhLTg0OWYtMDQ1NmIyODQ2ZGNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Bones: The Complete Seventh Season"</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: The Walking Dead: Created by Frank Darabont. With Norman Reedus, Melissa McBride, Lauren Cohan, Josh McDermitt. Sheriff Deputy Rick Grimes wakes up from a coma to learn the world is in ruins and must lead a group of survivors to stay alive." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1520211/","name":"The Walking Dead","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmU5NTcwNjktODIwMi00ZmZkLTk4ZWUtYzVjZWQ5ZTZjN2RlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Sheriff Deputy Rick Grimes wakes up from a coma to learn the world is in ruins and must lead a group of survivors to stay alive.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1520211/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"multiplayerxgesource"},"dateCreated":"2021-02-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Compelling but it's time for this to DIE","reviewBody":"The zombie genre has been dragged into an endless time loop of reboots, reimagined visions, and bland DRIVEL. Like fortnite....zombies have become more of a TOOL than actual intriguing storytelling anymore. Come up with something original pick another LORE to explore. Zombie entertainment has become much like woke and cancel culture..... OLD AND BORING. Grow up and get a life and try to enjoy entertainment that is deeper than being DEAD."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":895995,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Horror","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2010-10-31","keywords":"zombie,survival,post apocalypse,based on comic,zombie apocalypse","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0511088/","name":"Andrew Lincoln"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005342/","name":"Norman Reedus"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0564350/","name":"Melissa McBride"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019701/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0090153/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0092570/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001104/","name":"Frank Darabont"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 11 Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3631857689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGE4YWVjZjEtNWIwMC00YWM3LWIxMTUtOTMyMDAyYzQwMzJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGE4YWVjZjEtNWIwMC00YWM3LWIxMTUtOTMyMDAyYzQwMzJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Walking Dead returns August 22 on AMC. programme.desc: Bones: Created by Hart Hanson. With Emily Deschanel, David Boreanaz, Michaela Conlin, T.J. Thyne. Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0460627/","name":"Bones","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA3ODMxMzM5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDM1NjU0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0460627/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Alison107"},"dateCreated":"2005-09-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just Hope It Stays On the Air","reviewBody":"I didn't expect to like it as much as I liked it. In fact, it's a sure sign of cancellation how much I like this show. I never like crime shows. My mom loves them, but I find them dull, because they're about plots not characters. This is a crime show about characters (not as good as "The Closer" -- the crime show I adored this summer -- mind you), and I enjoyed it. At times, it seemed far-fetched, and the whole Senator plot-point in the pilot seemed awful easy, but the dialogue worked, the characters intrigue me, and the chemistry is great. I expect good things from it.\n\nAlison"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":145903,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2005-09-13","keywords":"forensic anthropologist,investigation,washington d.c.,crime scene investigation,murder investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0221043/","name":"Emily Deschanel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0174819/","name":"Michaela Conlin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0212869/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046572/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056447/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0361274/","name":"Hart Hanson"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bones: The Complete Seventh Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi748140825","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDA2MGRiODItYWI4Zi00ODdhLTg0OWYtMDQ1NmIyODQ2ZGNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDA2MGRiODItYWI4Zi00ODdhLTg0OWYtMDQ1NmIyODQ2ZGNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Bones: The Complete Seventh Season"}}</script><metacontent="
